tutorial_loadout_preset1.name: (Hidden) Hero Loadout UX 1
tutorial_loadout_preset1.description: Quest to track whether player has seen Hero Loadout onboarding.

tutorial_loadout_commander.name: (Hidden) Tutorial_Loadout_Commander
tutorial_loadout_commander.description: Quest to track whether player has seen Hero Loadout onboarding.

objectives.description: Trigger daily quest on log-in
Test Reeactive Quest 1
Test Reeactive Quest 2
Test Reeactive Quest 3
Find Lord Lizzards Castle
Collect 10 Clubs
Collect 2 Barnacle

elderquest_builddeployablebase.name: Base in the Box
elderquest_builddeployablebase.description:
The husks are plotting a large scale assault, and we need to take them by surprise.

Join up with other Commanders, build a base you can deploy to designated zones, and battle!
elderquest_builddeployablebase.completionText: Deployable base built and ready for battle!

objectives.description: Build a Deployable Base in Operation Block Party with 10 or more structures

elderquest_battlethehorde_1.name: Tele-Fortation
elderquest_battlethehorde_1.description:
Now it's time for you and your team to defend your deployable bases and eradicate the enemy!

Make sure you build weapons, ammo, and traps! You don't have much time or resources!

Once you're ready, access the Control Panel, select Tier 7 or higher difficulty, and let the battle begin!
elderquest_battlethehorde_1.completionText: The enemies have been defeated! Excellent job!

objectives.description: Complete a Tier 7 (or higher) of Operation Block Party

elderquest_elderunlock.name: Operation Block Party (Unlock)
elderquest_elderunlock.description:
Commander, your squad has done a great job in Stonewood battling husks and saving survivors. However, Operation Block Party needs your immediate attention! 

To unlock Operation Block Party: 
Select the Skills tab
Select the Operation Block Party skill node
Select purchase to unlock the skill node

objectives.description: Unlock Operation Block Party Skill Tree Node

genericquest_killnaturehusks_repeatable.name: Forces of Nature
genericquest_killnaturehusks_repeatable.description:
Now that you have access to a Perk Recombobulator, eliminate as many Nature Husks as you can to earn PERK-UPs to power it. Note: This is a repeatable Quest. Nature Husks can be found in Plankerton or higher areas.

The Perk Recombobulator feature is available after completing the Plankerton Storm Shield Defense 2 Quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate 300 Nature Husks in successful missions

genericquest_killmistmonsters_repeatable.name: Danger in the Mist
genericquest_killmistmonsters_repeatable.description:
Now that you have access to a Perk Recombobulator, eliminate as many Mist Monsters as you can to earn PERK-UPs to power it. Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

The Perk Recombobulator feature is available after completing the Plankerton Storm Shield Defense 2 Quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate 50 Mist Monsters in successful missions

genericquest_killwaterhusks_repeatable.name: A Watery Grave
genericquest_killwaterhusks_repeatable.description:
Now that you have access to a Perk Recombobulator, eliminate as many Water Husks as you can to earn PERK-UPs to power it. Note: This is a repeatable Quest. Water Husks can be found in Plankerton or higher areas.

The Perk Recombobulator feature is available after completing the Plankerton Storm Shield Defense 2 Quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate 300 Water Husks in successful missions

genericquest_killfirehusks_repeatable.name: Set the World on Fire
genericquest_killfirehusks_repeatable.description:
Now that you have access to a Perk Recombobulator, eliminate as many Fire Husks as you can to earn PERK-UPs to power it. Note: This is a repeatable Quest. Fire Husks can be found in Plankerton or higher areas.

The Perk Recombobulator feature is available after completing the Plankerton Storm Shield Defense 2 Quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate 300 Fire Husks in successful missions

genericquest_killminibosses_repeatable.name: Epic "Mini-Boss"
genericquest_killminibosses_repeatable.description: Eliminate as many Epic Mini-Bosses as you can, Commander! Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate an Epic Mini-Boss in a successful mission

genericquest_completestormzones_repeatab.name: Killer Storms
genericquest_completestormzones_repeatab.description: Storms are rapidly spreading. Look at all that purple turbulance on the map! Complete some missions in those hexes. Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

objectives.description: Complete 2 Mutant Storm or Elemental Storm missions

pickaxequest_stw004_tier_5.name: Vindertech Elite
pickaxequest_stw004_tier_5.description: Earn Level 4 Pickaxe upgrade. Visit the Command tab, select Upgrades, select Tools, and assign skill points to Pickaxe Upgrade.

objectives.description: Earn Level 4 Pickaxe upgrade
Complete Before and After Science

pickaxequest_stw003_tier_4.name: Hydraulic Wrecker
pickaxequest_stw003_tier_4.description: Earn Level 2 Pickaxe upgrade. Visit the Command tab, select Upgrades, select Tools, and assign skill points to Pickaxe Upgrade.

objectives.description: Earn Level 2 Pickaxe upgrade

pickaxequest_stw005_tier_6.name: Laser Pick
pickaxequest_stw005_tier_6.description: Earn Level 6 Pickaxe upgrade. Visit the Command tab, select Upgrades, select Tools, and assign skill points to Pickaxe Upgrade.

objectives.description: Earn Level 6 Pickaxe upgrade
Complete Homebase Storm Shield Defense 1

pickaxequest_stw006_tier_7.name: Axehammer
pickaxequest_stw006_tier_7.description: Earn Level 8 Pickaxe upgrade. Visit the Command tab, select Upgrades, select Tools, and assign skill points to Pickaxe Upgrade.

objectives.description: Earn Level 8 Pickaxe upgrade

pickaxequest_stw002_tier_3.name: Tech Axe
pickaxequest_stw002_tier_3.description: Earn Level 1 Pickaxe upgrade. Visit the Command tab, select Upgrades, select Tools, and assign skill points to Pickaxe Upgrade.

objectives.description: Earn Level 1 Pickaxe upgrade

stw_stormkinghard_firsttakedown.name: Regicide
stw_stormkinghard_firsttakedown.description: They say the bigger they are, the harder they fall. We certainly hope that is the case with this new Storm King. Good luck, Commander!
stw_stormkinghard_firsttakedown.completionText: Storm King Defeated in a Power Level 140+ Zone

objectives.description: Eliminate the Mythic Storm King

stw_stormkinghard_kingme.name: King Me
stw_stormkinghard_kingme.description: The Storm King's minions are tough and should provide a great way to hone your skills. They are also blocking the way to the Storm King, so eliminating them is not really optional.

objectives.description: Eliminate 2 Epic Mini-Bosses in a 140+ zone

achievement_loottreasurechests.name: Loot Legend
achievement_loottreasurechests.description: Complete this quest and earn a Challenge Banner!

objectives.description: Loot Treasure Chests in successful missions

achievement_explorezones.name: World Explorer
achievement_explorezones.description: Complete this quest and earn a Challenge Banner!

objectives.description: Fully explore zones in successful missions

achievement_savesurvivors.name: Guardian Angel
achievement_savesurvivors.description: Complete this quest and earn a Challenge Banner!

objectives.description: Save Survivors in successful missions

achievement_buildstructures.name: Talented Builder
achievement_buildstructures.description: Complete this quest and earn a Challenge Banner!

objectives.description: Build Structures in successful missions

achievement_playwithothers.name: Plays Well with Others
achievement_playwithothers.description: Complete this quest and earn a Challenge Banner!

objectives.description: Complete Play With Others missions

achievement_protectthesurvivors.name: (Hidden) Take Out Those Husks
achievement_protectthesurvivors.description: Quest to track when players protect the survivors during the onboarding mission. Once they do, fire off a console achievement.

objectives.description: (Hidden) Protect the survivors

achievement_destroygnomes.name: Go Gnome!
achievement_destroygnomes.description: Complete this quest and earn a Challenge Banner!

objectives.description: Destroy Garden Gnomes in successful missions

achievement_killmistmonsters.name: Unspeakable Horrors
achievement_killmistmonsters.description: Complete this quest and earn a Challenge Banner!

objectives.description: Eliminate Mist Monsters in successful missions

achievement_craftfirstweapon.name: (Hidden) Craft Another Gun Type of Storm
achievement_craftfirstweapon.description: Quest to track when players craft their first weapon during the onboarding mission. Once they do, fire off a console achievement.

objectives.description: (Hidden) Craft your first weapon

stwirwinintro_feed_quest_a2.name: The Wolf Snack
stwirwinintro_feed_quest_a2.description: Bribe Gia's wolf pack and other animals into spilling their secrets with tasty treats.

objectives.description: Feed the animals.

stwirwinintro_build_quest_a7.name: Buildasaurus Rex
stwirwinintro_build_quest_a7.description: Distract the raptor forces with a perfectly built dino distraction.

objectives.description: Build a dino distraction

stwirwinintro_reactivekill_quest_a4.name: The Attack Pack
stwirwinintro_reactivekill_quest_a4.description: Eliminate wolfy confusion by teaching the pack to take out the husk horde.

objectives.description: Eliminate husks with a tamed wolf.

stwirwinintro_fetch_quest_a3.name: The Most Dangerous Tame
stwirwinintro_fetch_quest_a3.description: Help Ray and Gia bring peace to the wilds of Homebase with a no holds barred taming spree.

objectives.description: Tame Animals

stwirwinintro_reactivekill_quest_a1.name: Brawl of the Wild
stwirwinintro_reactivekill_quest_a1.description: Go on a wild game hunt to help Ray and Dennis take on the dangerous animal invasion.

objectives.description: Eliminate the wild animals.

stwirwinintro_fetch_quest_a5.name: Not To Boar You
stwirwinintro_fetch_quest_a5.description: Harness the searching skills the animal kingdom by joining a boar scavenger hunt.

objectives.description: Harness the boar's searching skills.

stwirwinintro_reactivekill_quest_a6.name: In the hall of the Raptor Queen
stwirwinintro_reactivekill_quest_a6.description: Help the Raptor Queen cleanse her kingdom of mist monsters.

objectives.description: Eliminate Mist Monsters with a tamed raptor.

stonewoodquest_fetch_researchcrates.name: Audition
stonewoodquest_fetch_researchcrates.description: Lars offers to setup a research lab at homebase. There was some equipment he ordered just before the storm, that never got delivered. We need to retrieve the shipments. This quest can be completed in the City, Suburban and Industrial zones.

objectives.description: Collect Research Equipment in a [UIRating]+ City, Suburban, or Industrial zone

stonewoodquest_fetch_stormcalls.name: Kicking and Screaming
stonewoodquest_fetch_stormcalls.description: We are receiving disturbing transmissions from Dennis. Retrieve these distress transmissions.

objectives.description: Collect Distress Transmissions in a [UIRating]+ City, Suburban, or Industrial zone

stonewoodquest_closegate_d1.name: Before and After Science
stonewoodquest_closegate_d1.completionText: We've got lasers! ATLAS Atmospheric Laser schematic obtained!

objectives.description: Complete a Fight the Storm mission

stonewoodquest_fetch_trashcans.name: Mandatory Minimalism
stonewoodquest_fetch_trashcans.description: Everyone at Homebase is getting robbed. Search garbage cans in the zone to identify the culprit.

objectives.description: Search Garbage Cans for lost items in a [UIRating]+ City, Suburban, or Industrial zone

stonewoodquest_mechanical_killhusks.name: Recruit Training
stonewoodquest_mechanical_killhusks.description: It's time to teach our defender trainee how to fight. Take on those husks!

objectives.description: Eliminate Husks with Melee Weapons in successful missions in a [UIRating]+ zone
Eliminate Husks with Ranged Weapons in successful missions in a [UIRating]+ zone
Eliminate Husks with Traps in successful missions in a [UIRating]+ zone

stonewoodquest_fetch_triangulatingpop.name: Triangulating a Circle
stonewoodquest_fetch_triangulatingpop.description: We need to triangulate Pop's position. See what you can do, Commander!  Try Industrial or Urban Zones!

objectives.description: Deploy Scanners in a [UIRating]+ zone

stonewoodquest_landmark_buildoff.name: Build Off!
stonewoodquest_landmark_buildoff.description: It's a build off between Kyle and Penny! Complete a Constructor Build Off mission.

objectives.description: Complete the Constructor Build Off mission

stonewoodquest_treasuredfriends.name: Treasured Friends
stonewoodquest_treasuredfriends.description: Go on a treasure hunt to stock up on weapons, ammo, traps, and crafting resources. Quest progress is shared with the group.

objectives.description: Loot a Treasure Chest in a successful mission in a [UIRating]+ zone

stonewoodquest_filler_2_d5.name: Countdown
stonewoodquest_filler_2_d5.description: Smashers and Takers are on the rampage. Defeat those Mist Monsters!

objectives.description: Eliminate 5 Mist Monsters in successful missions in a [UIRating]+ zone
Complete 3 missions in a [UIRating]+ zone
(Hidden) Collect 50 Items

stonewoodquest_side_1_d3.name: Troll Thieves
stonewoodquest_side_1_d3.description: Whack some Trolls and reclaim that BluGlo!

objectives.description: Whack 2 Trolls in successful missions in a [UIRating]+ zone

stonewoodquest_reactive_fetch_hoverboard.name: Want to Build a Hoverboard?
stonewoodquest_reactive_fetch_hoverboard.description: I just realized you don't have a Hoverboard! Let's fix that. Destroy Hot Rods to collect everything we'll need to build a Hoverboard.

objectives.description: Search City Zones for Hot Rods in successful missions in a [UIRating]+ zone

stonewoodquest_filler_2_d4.name: Medic!
stonewoodquest_filler_2_d4.description: Stock up on healing! Craft 5 Healing Pads, and complete 2 missions.

objectives.description: Craft Healing Pads
Complete 2 missions in a [UIRating]+ zone

stonewoodquest_side_1_d5.name: The Prestige
stonewoodquest_side_1_d5.description: If you can't handle Stonewood at its worst, you don't deserve those 15 survivors...

objectives.description: Save 15 Survivors in successful missions
Complete 3 missions in a [UIRating]+ zone

stonewoodquest_filler_1_d4.name: Leave Only Footprints
stonewoodquest_filler_1_d4.description: The husks have done us wrong, let's go do 'em in. Clear husk encampments and search for more.

objectives.description: Clear 4 Husk Encampments in successful missions in a [UIRating]+ zone
Complete 2 missions in a [UIRating]+ zone

stonewoodquest_side_1_d4.name: Group Effort
stonewoodquest_side_1_d4.description:
It's time to join up with other Commanders and complete a mission in Stonewood!

This Quest must be completed in Stonewood.

objectives.description: Complete 2 Play with Others missions in Stonewood

stonewoodquest_gathercollect_armoryupgra.name: Up in Arms
stonewoodquest_gathercollect_armoryupgra.description: The armory needs an upgrade. Gather machine parts by destroying industrial machinery to upgrade the manufacturing and modding capacity of the armory.

objectives.description: Collect Machine Parts in a [UIRating]+ Industrial zone

stonewoodquest_killcollect_mistmonsters.name: Horrors from the Mist
stonewoodquest_killcollect_mistmonsters.description: Gather as much data as you can from the Mist Monsters to prepare for a showdown with the Storm King.

objectives.description: Collect Mist Monster data in a [UIRating]+ zone

stonewoodquest_ability_hoverboard.name: Cruise Control
stonewoodquest_ability_hoverboard.description: It's time to hover! Hold down the (build/combat) mode switch button to activate your Hoverboard.

objectives.description: Ride your Hoverboard
Complete a mission in a [UIRating]+ zone

stonewoodquest_mechanical_buildlev2.name: Build Off 2: Reinforcement
stonewoodquest_mechanical_buildlev2.description: Kyle and Penny's final build off! Let's build some more structures!

objectives.description: Build Level 2 Structures in successful missions in a [UIRating]+ zone

homebasequest_unlockemtworker.name: (Hidden) EMT Worker (Unlock)
homebasequest_unlockemtworker.description: Quest to track unlock the EMT Worker skill tree node.
homebasequest_unlockemtworker.completionText: EMT Worker skill tree node unlocked!

objectives.description: Unlock EMT Worker Skill Tree Node

homebaseonboarding.name: (Hidden) Onboarding
homebaseonboarding.description: Quest to track when Onboarding mission has been completed.

homebaseonboardingafteroutpost.name: Loot Llamas
homebaseonboardingafteroutpost.description: You've earned a Mini-Llama and enough V-bucks to purchase one Upgrade Llama. Head to the Loot tab and get that loot!

objectives.description: Redeem a Mini Llama from the Loot tab
Purchase an Upgrade Llama from the Loot tab
Continue the fight!

homebasequest_unlockmissiondefender.name: Mission Defender (Unlock)
homebasequest_unlockmissiondefender.description:
Defenders can also accompany your heroes on missions, provided that you don't already have a full team of Heroes.

To unlock your first Missions Defender:
Select the Skills tab
Select Skill Tree: Tier 1
Select the Mission Defender skill node
Select Purchase to unlock the skill node
homebasequest_unlockmissiondefender.completionText: Mission Defender skill tree node unlocked!

objectives.description: Unlock Mission Defender Skill Tree Node

homebasequest_completeexpedition.name: Expeditions
homebasequest_completeexpedition.description:
Well done, Commander! You can now send your Heroes on Expeditions. If an Expedition is successful, you receive rewards! Your Heroes will need People and Vehicles to accompany them. Expeditions take time to complete and are not guaranteed to succeed.

Visit the Command tab to assign your Heroes on an Expedition. After an Expedition has been completed, go back to the Expeditions Squads tab and see if it was successful!

objectives.description: Complete an Expedition

homebasequest_unlocksquads.name: Unlock Squads
homebasequest_unlocksquads.description:
Increase your Homebase Power by assigning Survivors to a Survivor Squad.

To unlock the ability to assign a Survivor to one of your Survivor Squads:
Select the Skills tab
Select Skill Tree: Tier 1
Select the Squads skill node
Select Purchase to unlock the skill node

objectives.description: Purchase the Unlock Squads Skill Tree Node

homebasequest_unlockexpeditions.name: (Hidden) Expeditions (Unlock)
homebasequest_unlockexpeditions.description: Quest to track unlock the Expeditions skill tree node.

objectives.description: Unlock Expeditions Skill Tree Node

homebasequest_slotoutpostdefender.name: (Hidden) Homebase Defender (Slot)
homebasequest_slotoutpostdefender.description:
Congratulations, Commander! You have recruited a Rifleman Defender.

To assign your Defender to your Defender Squad:
Select the Squads tab
Select the Defender Squads tab
Select Stonewood Storm Shield
Select the Rifleman Defender slot
Select your Rifleman Defender to slot

objectives.description: (Hidden) Used for Achievement Purposes

homebasequest_unlockoutpostdefender.name: Homebase Defender (Unlock)
homebasequest_unlockoutpostdefender.description:
Commander, we're going to need more help in the next Storm Shield Defense. We can recruit certain survivors to become Defenders.

To unlock your first Storm Shield Defender:
Select the Skills tab
Select Skill Tree: Tier 1
Select the Homebase Defender skill node
Select Purchase to unlock the skill node
homebasequest_unlockoutpostdefender.completionText: Homebase Defender skill tree node unlocked!

objectives.description: Unlock Homebase Defender Skill Tree Node

homebasequest_slotemtworker.name: EMT Worker (Slot)
homebasequest_slotemtworker.description:
Well done, Commander! You have unlocked the first EMT Worker slot. Slotting a Survivor in this slot will increase your Homebase Power.

To assign one of your Survivors to your EMT Squad:
Select the Squads tab
Select the Survivor Squads tab
Select EMT Squad
Select the 1st EMT Worker slot
Select a Survivor to slot

objectives.description: Assign a Survivor to the 1st EMT Squad slot

homebasequest_unlockresearch.name: (Hidden) Research (Unlock)
homebasequest_unlockresearch.description: Quest to track unlock the Research skill tree node.

objectives.description: Unlock Research Skill Tree Node

homebaseonboardinggrantschematics.name: (Hidden) Grant Starting Schematics
homebaseonboardinggrantschematics.description: Quest to track when Homebase Storm Shield Defense 1 has been completed. Once it is completed, grant starting schematics behind the scenes to players.

objectives.description: Complete Homebase Storm Shield Defense 1

homebasequest_slotfireteamalphaworker.name: Fire Team Alpha Worker (Slot)
homebasequest_slotfireteamalphaworker.description:
Well done, Commander! You have unlocked the first Fire Team Alpha Worker slot. Slotting a Survivor in this slot will increase your Homebase Power.

To assign one of your Survivors to your Fire Team Alpha Squad:
Select the Squads tab
Select the Survivor Squads tab
Select Fire Team Alpha
Select the 1st Fire Team Alpha Worker slot
Select a Survivor to slot

objectives.description: Assign a Survivor to the 1st Fire Team Alpha slot

homebasequest_researchpurchase.name: Research
homebasequest_researchpurchase.description:
Research allows you to upgrade your technologies. These new technologies cost Research Points. You earn Research Points over time. Collect enough Research Points to purchase the Fortitude Research Node.

To unlock the Fortitude Research Node:
Select the Skills tab
Select Research: Tier 1
Select the Fortitude Research node
Select Purchase to unlock the node

objectives.description: Purchase Fortitude Research Node

homebasequest_unlockfireteamalphaworker.name: (Hidden) Fire Team Alpha Worker (Unlock)
homebasequest_unlockfireteamalphaworker.description: Quest to track unlock the Fire Team Alpha Worker skill tree node.
homebasequest_unlockfireteamalphaworker.completionText: Fire Team Alpha skill tree node unlocked!

objectives.description: Unlock Fire Team Alpha Skill Tree Node

homebasequest_slotmissiondefender.name: (Hidden) Mission Defender (Slot)
homebasequest_slotmissiondefender.description:
Well done, Commander! You have unlocked the first Mission Defender slot.

To assign one of your Defenders to accompany you on a mission:
Select the Heroes tab
Select the 1st Mission Defender slot
Select a Defender to slot

objectives.description: (Hidden) Used for Achievement Purposes

homebasequest_weakpointvision.name: Weakpoint Vision
homebasequest_weakpointvision.description:
When harvesting, a "Weak Point" will display as a flash of blue light. Swing for the light and reap the rewards!

To unlock Weakpoint Vision:
Select the Skills tab
Select Skill Tree: Tier 1
Select the Weakpoint Vision skill node
Select Purchase to unlock the skill node
homebasequest_weakpointvision.completionText: Weakpoint Vision skill tree node unlocked!

objectives.description: Unlock Weakpoint Vision Skill Tree Node

weeklyquest_tiered_completemissionalerts.name: (Weekly) Complete Mission Alerts
weeklyquest_tiered_completemissionalerts.description: The storm's looking rowdy.  Complete some Mission Alerts!

objectives.description: Complete 10 Mission Alerts in a [UIRating]+ zone

stw_stormkinghard_weekly_006.name: (Weekly) Scions of the Storm King: Defend the Van
stw_stormkinghard_weekly_006.description: The Storm King's power grows! We need to survey the Storm for changes!

objectives.description: Complete 3 Ride the Lightning missions in 140+ Zones

stw_stormkinghard_weekly_007.name: (Weekly) Scions of the Storm King: Elemental Husks
stw_stormkinghard_weekly_007.description: The Storm King's power grows! Deal with the Elemental Husks that have surged as a result!

objectives.description: Eliminate 300 Elementals in Successful missions in 140+ Zones

stw_stormkinghard_weekly_004.name: (Weekly) Scions of the Storm King: Mist Monsters
stw_stormkinghard_weekly_004.description: The Storm King's power grows! Fight back the Mist Monsters surging as a result!

objectives.description: Eliminate 20 Mist Monsters in Successful Missions in 140+ Zones.

stw_stormkinghard_weekly_001.name: (Weekly) Scions of the Storm King: Mimics
stw_stormkinghard_weekly_001.description: The Storm King's power grows! Hunt down mimics to slow him down.

objectives.description: Defeat 2 Mimics in Successful Missions in 140+ Zones

stw_stormkinghard_weekly_002.name: (Weekly) Scions of the Storm King: Storm Chests
stw_stormkinghard_weekly_002.description: The Storm King's power grows! We need to find the Storm Chests!

objectives.description: Complete 1 Storm Chests in 140+ Zones

stw_stormkinghard_weekly_003.name: (Weekly) Scions of the Storm King: Minibosses
stw_stormkinghard_weekly_003.description: The Storm King's power grows! Defeat Minibosses to take out his support!

objectives.description: Defeat 3 Minibosses in Successful Missions in 140+ Zones

stw_stormkinghard_weekly_showdown.name: (Weekly) Defeat the Mythic Storm King!
stw_stormkinghard_weekly_showdown.description: You've weakened the Storm King! Now's the time to strike! Send him packing!
stw_stormkinghard_weekly_showdown.completionText: Storm King Defeated in a Power Level 140+ Zone

objectives.description: Defeat the Mythic Storm King.

stw_stormkinghard_weekly_005.name: (Weekly) Scions of the Storm King: Survivors
stw_stormkinghard_weekly_005.description: The Storm King's power grows! Save the Survivors affected before it's too late!

objectives.description: Rescue 10 Survivors in Successful Missions in 140+ Zones

Gather 5 pieces of Smasher data in successful missions in a [UIRating]+ zone

reactivequest_knowyourenemy.name: Know Your Enemy
reactivequest_knowyourenemy.completionText: Excellent, that's enough samples, let's see what we can find out.

objectives.description: Collect Husk Data in successful missions in a [UIRating]+ zone

reactivequest_finddj.name: Deeply Disturbing Simulations
reactivequest_finddj.description: Search for the Weatherman. May require multiple missions.

objectives.description: Search for clues to find the Weatherman in successful missions in a [UIRating]+ zone

reactivequest_gathercollect_halloween_4.name: Aromatic for the People
reactivequest_gathercollect_halloween_4.description: We need to make sure any remaining survivors have a chance to fight back until we return. Start by collecting garlic.

objectives.description: Collect 12 Pristine Braids of Garlic by harvesting cupboards, shelves, and shacks in successful Hexsylvania missions

reactivequest_halloween_fetch_1.name: Vampire Records
reactivequest_halloween_fetch_1.description: We need to let the survivors of Hexsylvania know we're here to help. Head out into the mist and spread the word!

objectives.description: Place 15 Gramophones in successful Hexsylvania missions

reactivequest_medicaldata.name: The Knack
reactivequest_medicaldata.description: Search nearby computers for medical journals. May require multiple missions.
reactivequest_medicaldata.completionText: An expert doctor has joined your Homebase!

objectives.description: Download 4 Medical Records in successful missions in a [UIRating]+ zone
Complete 2 missions in a [UIRating]+ zone

reactivequest_halloween_fetch_5.name: Loot Drop
reactivequest_halloween_fetch_5.description: Distribute survival kits to give remaining survivors a fighting chance!

objectives.description: Place 15 Survival Kits in successful Hexsylvania missions

reactivequest_findsurvivor.name: Family Ties
reactivequest_findsurvivor.description: A survivors family member is in danger! Search the caves.
reactivequest_findsurvivor.completionText: You've found and rescued the Survivors loved one.

objectives.description: Find the Survivor's Wife

reactivequest_poisonlobbers.name: Lok's Monsters: Bees!
reactivequest_poisonlobbers.description: Collect Bee Lobber samples for Lok.

objectives.description: Gather 10 pieces of Bee Lobber enemy data in successful missions in a [UIRating]+ zone

reactivequest_halloween_killcollect_take.name: Lok's Book of Monsters: Vampire Takers
reactivequest_halloween_killcollect_take.description: Is it just me, or are the takers here a little vampirey? Eliminate some Vampire Takers, and collect samples.
reactivequest_halloween_killcollect_take.completionText: Lok's Monster Book has been updated!

objectives.description: Collect 15 data samples from Vampire Takers in successful Hexsylvania missions

reactivequest_gathercollect_halloween_2.name: Curse the Darkness
reactivequest_gathercollect_halloween_2.description: Vlad supposedly created a powerful enchanted ore called Vladimantium. We could use some powerful enchanted ores! Collect some for analysis.
reactivequest_gathercollect_halloween_2.completionText: Turns out the Vladamantium is... iron. Regular, Vlad-free iron.

objectives.description: Collect 25 Vladamantium ingots by harvesting Chandeliers and Candelabras in successful Hexsylvania missions

reactivequest_gathercollect_halloween_3.name: Vlad Luck
reactivequest_gathercollect_halloween_3.description: It wouldn't hurt to have a vampire detection system. Harvest mirrors to collect any mirror fragments.
reactivequest_gathercollect_halloween_3.completionText: We have all the bad luck we can carry!

objectives.description: Collect 13 Mirror Fragments by harvesting mirrors in successful Hexsylvania missions
Gather 5 pieces of Flinger enemy data in successful missions in a [UIRating]+ zone

reactivequest_gatherhydraulic_2.name: Ctrl Assault Delete
reactivequest_gatherhydraulic_2.description: Part of the Hydraulic Weapons update was deleted. If you can collect hydraulic rifle parts we should be able to recreate one of the missing prototypes from memory.
reactivequest_gatherhydraulic_2.completionText: That seems right! Here, take the prototype out for a spin.

objectives.description: Collect hydraulic rifle parts by harvesting mechanical objects in successful missions

reactivequest_halloween_destroy_4.name: Disintegration
reactivequest_halloween_destroy_4.description: I'm getting reports of graves with high levels of storm corruption. So... you know. Take care of that.
reactivequest_halloween_destroy_4.completionText: Well done! Let's never discuss this again.

objectives.description: Destroy 4 Gothic Graves in successful Hexsylvania missions

reactivequest_avoiceinthenight.name: A Voice in the Night
reactivequest_avoiceinthenight.description: The Weatherman is in danger! Search for radios, and listen for clues. May require multiple missions.
reactivequest_avoiceinthenight.completionText: A survivor has joined your Homebase!

objectives.description: Recover 4 Broadcasts in successful missions in a [UIRating]+ zone
Eliminate the Smasher
Complete the Vindertech Research Lab mission

reactivequest_gathercollect_halloween_5.name: Stakes, Well Done
reactivequest_gathercollect_halloween_5.description: Collect wooden stakes for the survivor care packages.

objectives.description: Collect 30 Wooden Stakes by harvesting trees in Hexsylvania, requires successful missions

reactivequest_trollstash_r1.name: Troll Key
reactivequest_trollstash_r1.description: Whack a Trolls sometimes drop special keys that will open the Epic loot stash chest. Find the key, and then we'll start a treasure hunt!
reactivequest_trollstash_r1.completionText: Now you have the key, it can be used on a Troll stash chest. The tricky bit will be finding one.

objectives.description: Find the Troll Key in a [UIRating]+ zone

reactivequest_transmitters.name: Signal Boost
reactivequest_transmitters.description: We need to boost our transmission strength, search for locators we can use. May require multiple missions.
reactivequest_transmitters.completionText: Connection established in, 3, 2, 1 ... we have success!

objectives.description: Deploy 3 locators in successful missions (often found in City zones) in a [UIRating]+ zone

reactivequest_findgothicruins.name: Hexsylvanian Gothic
reactivequest_findgothicruins.description: Explore Hexsylvania's Gothic Ruins in successful missions.
reactivequest_findgothicruins.completionText: That's enough gothic melancholia for today!

objectives.description: Explore 6 Gothic Ruins in successful Hexsylvania missions.

reactivequest_halloween_destroy_3.name: Leaving Less Cages
reactivequest_halloween_destroy_3.description: Let's do the survivors a favor and destroy any cages you find in the catacombs. I don't want those husks getting any ideas...

objectives.description: Destroy 10 Cages in successful Hexsylvania missions

reactivequest_scavenger_1.name: Post Apocalyptic Warfare

cannyvalley_reactive_trees.description: Distract... I mean, recruit Penny to help collect support beams.

objectives.description: Collect support beams in a [UIRating]+ Arid zone

cannyvalley_reactive_junkfood.name: Comfort Food
cannyvalley_reactive_junkfood.description: Cheer up Homebase by collecting unhealthy comfort food left in the RV trailers by tourists.

objectives.description: Collect junk food in a [UIRating]+ Thunder Route 99 or Ghost Town zone

cannyvalley_reactive_aftercredits.name: How I Wonder What You Are
cannyvalley_reactive_aftercredits.description: Take a look back, and a look at things to come.

objectives.description: Deploy telescopes in a [UIRating]+ zone

cannyvalley_reactive_powertransformers.name: Power to the People
cannyvalley_reactive_powertransformers.description: Close in on Vinderman's mansion by searching for power transformers and tracing mysterious powerlines that go seemingly nowhere.

objectives.description: Inspect Power Transformers in a [UIRating]+ zone

cannyvalley_reactive_clocks.name: When There's a Will...
cannyvalley_reactive_clocks.description: Help Ray collect clock parts for a LAW-Bot.

objectives.description: Collect clock parts in a [UIRating]+ Ghost Town zone

cannyvalley_reactive_cannons.name: Cannon Fodder
cannyvalley_reactive_cannons.description: Help Dennis rock out to shake off the Homebase funk.

objectives.description: Collect cannons in a [UIRating]+ Ghost Town zone

cannyvalley_reactive_bikes.name: A Bonding Experience
cannyvalley_reactive_bikes.description: Get ready for one last ride...

objectives.description: Collect motorcycles in a [UIRating]+ Thunder Route 99 zone
(Hidden) Watch Canny Valley Video

cannyvalley_reactive_mainframes.name: Bandwidth Issues
cannyvalley_reactive_mainframes.description: Collect circuit boards from servers to increase the Vinderman AI's processing power.

objectives.description: Collect Circuit Boards by destroying servers in a [UIRating]+ zone

cannyvalley_reactive_trophies.name: Three Strikes
cannyvalley_reactive_trophies.description: Hone your combat skills by battling minibosses.

objectives.description: Eliminate minibosses in a [UIRating]+ zone

cannyvalley_reactive_tinfoil.name: Reverse Tinfoil Hats
cannyvalley_reactive_tinfoil.description: Foil the Storm King's mind control scheme by deploying decoy hats mimicking brain waves on Ghost Town Scarecrows.

objectives.description: Deploy decoy hats in a [UIRating]+ Ghost Town zone

cannyvalley_reactive_vacuum.name: Excalibur 2.0
cannyvalley_reactive_vacuum.description: Help Clip construct a powerful new weapon by collecting Vacuum Parts from destroyed Vacuums.

objectives.description: Collect Vacuum Parts in a [UIRating]+ Thunder Route 99 zone

cannyvalley_landmark_mansion.name: Have You Tried Turning It On and Off Again?
cannyvalley_landmark_mansion.description: Explore Vinderman's mansion and unpack the Vinderman AI from the SEE-Bot to the Mansion's mainframe.

objectives.description: Activate the Vinderman AI

cannyvalley_reactive_signalexplore.name: Signal Strength
cannyvalley_reactive_signalexplore.description: Try to find the source of Homebase's overwhelming dread by taking measurements in motels, diners, deep mines, gas stations, junkyards and old forts.

objectives.description: Search for the source of The Nothing in a [UIRating]+ Thunder Route 99 or Ghost Town zone

cannyvalley_mechanical_killriotshields.name: Fridge Logic
cannyvalley_mechanical_killriotshields.description: These Huskies are causing a riot! See what you can do about them!

objectives.description: Eliminate Riot Shield Huskies in a [UIRating]+ zone

cannyvalley_reactive_jukeboxes.name: A Harrowing Journey Of Drumming
cannyvalley_reactive_jukeboxes.description: Steel Wool needs a new drummer. Destroy jukeboxes for the parts needed to build a new drummer. Most often found in Thunder Route 99 zones.
cannyvalley_reactive_jukeboxes.completionText: We'd better find Anthony before he finds Gravestone.

objectives.description: Gather parts from destroyed jukeboxes in a [UIRating]+ zone

cannyvalley_reactive_servers.name: Say Watt?
cannyvalley_reactive_servers.description: Gather data from old servers left at the empty underground bases. Can be only completed in a desert or Thunder Route 99 zone.
cannyvalley_reactive_servers.completionText: According to the files we recovered, Carlos and Desiree are working together somewhere in Canny Valley.

objectives.description: Search Servers in a [UIRating]+ zone

cannyvalley_reactive_rockformations.name: Ready To Rock
cannyvalley_reactive_rockformations.description: Syd is tracking a possible mass extinction event in the past. Help him gather the rock samples from the tornado-shaped rocks in the area. Can be only completed in a desert or Thunder Route 99 zone.
cannyvalley_reactive_rockformations.completionText: We were, in fact, ready to rock.

objectives.description: Gather Rock Samples in a [UIRating]+ zone

cannyvalley_landmark_memorial.name: V
cannyvalley_landmark_memorial.description: It's time for Ray to say goodbye to an old Friend. Help Penny build a memorial for Dr. Vinderman.
cannyvalley_landmark_memorial.completionText: Thank you for the monument, Commaner.

objectives.description: Build a Memorial in a [UIRating]+ zone

cannyvalley_hidden_enablegunslinger.name: (Hidden) Canny Valley Enable Dark Gunslinger Spawn Quest

objectives.description: (Hidden) Complete CannyValley_Landmark_HighNoon Quest

cannyvalley_reactive_bases.name: Canny Underground
cannyvalley_reactive_bases.description: Search the borders of arid zones for underground bunkers. Can be only completed in a desert or Thunder Route 99 zone.
cannyvalley_reactive_bases.completionText: We need to find out what the survivors in the bunkers were working on.

objectives.description: Search Bunkers in a [UIRating]+ zone

cannyvalley_reactive_tabs.name: The Cyclone Of Your Love
cannyvalley_reactive_tabs.description: Help Syd prepare for a potential reunion by collecting Steel Wool songbooks. Most often found in Thunder Route 99 zones.
cannyvalley_reactive_tabs.completionText: It's true, you can't hide in the light from the thunder.

objectives.description: Collect Songbooks in a [UIRating]+ zone

cannyvalley_mechanical_constructor.name: Just Build
cannyvalley_mechanical_constructor.description: With all the sharp-shooting husks in Canny Valley, it's time to brush up on combat building. Build 100 structures in a successful mission.
cannyvalley_mechanical_constructor.completionText: Don't forget to flex those building skills when fighting powerful enemies.

objectives.description: Build Structures in a [UIRating]+ zone

cannyvalley_reactive_route99.name: Road Trip
cannyvalley_reactive_route99.description: Kick off the Thunder Route 99 roadtrip with some exploration. Visit a diner, motel, gas station, and a truck stop. Can be only completed in a Thunder Route 99 zone.
cannyvalley_reactive_route99.completionText: We are officially on a road trip!

objectives.description: Visit a diner in a [UIRating]+ zone
Visit a motel in a [UIRating]+ zone
Visit a gas station in a [UIRating]+ zone
Visit a truck stop in a [UIRating]+ zone

cannyvalley_reactive_watertowers.name: My Dearest Sophie
cannyvalley_reactive_watertowers.description: Before we face the Legendary Gunslinger husk, we'd better learn more about Blackboot Ayers. Search the area for eyewitness accounts of Ayers' reign of terror. Look for old watertowers and windmills. Can be only completed in a desert or Thunder Route 99 zone.
cannyvalley_reactive_watertowers.completionText: We will avenge you, Sophie and Alister!

objectives.description: Find Old Diary Pages in a [UIRating]+ zone

cannyvalley_landmark_highnoon.name: Gravestone
cannyvalley_landmark_highnoon.description: Explore the town of Gravestone and prepare for a high noon duel with the deadliest husk in Canny Valley.
cannyvalley_landmark_highnoon.completionText: The legendary gunslinger is gone! Stay tuned for more Canny Valley adventures soon.

objectives.description: Battle Legendary Gunslinger Husk in a [UIRating]+ zone, and explore Gravestone.

cannyvalley_reactive_oilsamples.name: Canny Crude!
cannyvalley_reactive_oilsamples.description: Help Syd survey Canny Valley by gathering crude oil samples from abandoned oil rigs. Can be only completed in a desert or Thunder Route 99 zone.
cannyvalley_reactive_oilsamples.completionText: There are trace elements of storm corruption in the samples...  That can't be good.

objectives.description: Collect Oil Samples in a [UIRating]+ zone

cannyvalley_reactive_tumbleweed.name: Thar She Tumbles
cannyvalley_reactive_tumbleweed.description: We're unable to pinpoint Gravestone's location from homebase. We'll have to find another way. Can be only completed in a desert or Thunder Route 99 zone.
cannyvalley_reactive_tumbleweed.completionText: Thanks tumbleweeds! You truly are nature's GPS.

objectives.description: Collect Tumbleweed Movement Data in a [UIRating]+ zone

cannyvalley_reactive_trail.name: It's Showtime
cannyvalley_reactive_trail.description: We need to find Anthony before the husks do. Follow the trail posts and search for clues. Can be only completed in a desert or Thunder Route 99 zone.
cannyvalley_reactive_trail.completionText: Not gonna lie here, Commander. I'd watch that show.

objectives.description: Find Trail Posts in a [UIRating]+ zone

cannyvalley_landmark_welcome.name: Please Hold
cannyvalley_landmark_welcome.description: Canny Valley, here we come! Get ready to explore the world beyond Plankerton. Can be only completed in Thunder Route 99.
cannyvalley_landmark_welcome.completionText: What are we waiting for? Let's go explore!

objectives.description: Discover Landmark in a [UIRating]+ zone

cannyvalley_reactive_glyphs.name: Concept Art
cannyvalley_reactive_glyphs.description: Deploy scanners to scan the mysterious glyphs in mines and caves. Can be only completed in a desert or Thunder Route 99 zone.
cannyvalley_reactive_glyphs.completionText: If these glyphs can be trusted, this might not be the first appearance of the the storm...

objectives.description: Deploy Scanners in a [UIRating]+ zone

cannyvalley_reactive_rustedcars.name: Stalled Out
cannyvalley_reactive_rustedcars.description: Search the abandoned cars of Thunder Route 99 for clues.
cannyvalley_reactive_rustedcars.completionText: The survivors of thunder route 99 we very organized. Someone must have been in charge.

objectives.description: Search Cars in a [UIRating]+ zone

cannyvalley_reactive_seebot.name: See You Later
cannyvalley_reactive_seebot.description: SEE-bot is driving everyone at Homebase insane. Deploy SEE-bot for critical updates. Can be only completed in a desert or Thunder Route 99 zone.
cannyvalley_reactive_seebot.completionText: See you later, SEE-bot. Much, much, later.

objectives.description: Update SEE-bot in a [UIRating]+ zone

cannyvalley_reactive_survey.name: What Are Names?
cannyvalley_reactive_survey.description: Follow the trail of survey equipment to find Lars' former bandmate, Syd. Can be only completed in a desert or Thunder Route 99 zone.

objectives.description: Find Survey Equipment in a [UIRating]+ zone

cannyvalley_reactive_dinobones.name: The Bones Collector
cannyvalley_reactive_dinobones.description: Help Dennis collect bones for his latest experiment. Can be only completed in a desert or Thunder Route 99 zone.

objectives.description: Collect Bones in a [UIRating]+ zone

cannyvalley_reactive_periscopes.description: Investigate the strange land periscopes reported in the desert. Can be only completed in a desert or Thunder Route 99 zone.

objectives.description: Find Periscopes in a [UIRating]+ zone

Retrieve oil lanterns in a [UIRating]+ Ghost Town zone

phoenix_gathercollect_quest_b3.name: Intro to Dark Magic
phoenix_gathercollect_quest_b3.description: A truth storm has hit Homebase. Find arcane reference books to discover the cause.

objectives.description: Collect arcane reference books

phoenix_reactivekill_quest_b8.name: Accidental Guests
phoenix_reactivekill_quest_b8.description: ...You might have accidentally summoned Mist Monsters while trying to help Carter. Hunt them down and eliminate them!

objectives.description: Eliminate Mist Monsters

phoenix_killcollect_quest_b2.name: Like A Sponge
phoenix_killcollect_quest_b2.description: The Husks have been absorbing this weird energy for ages. Eliminate them and collect data on the energy field.

objectives.description: Eliminate Husks and collect data

phoenix_fetch_quest_b1.name: Cursed Materials
phoenix_fetch_quest_b1.description: Clip is short on gun crafting materials. Search barrels of scrap for the parts she needs!

objectives.description: Search scrap barrels for gun parts

phoenix_fetch_quest_b4.name: Good Morning, Spirit Realm
phoenix_fetch_quest_b4.description: There's a lost soul haunting Clip's latest gun! Salvage old televisions in Hexsylvania to build a way to communicate with it.

objectives.description: Search televisions for parts

phoenix_destroy_quest_b6.name: Needling the Competition
phoenix_destroy_quest_b6.description: Carter might be here because she wants revenge on her old rivals. Find the tombstones of Needle and his gang and destroy them!

objectives.description: Destroy Tombstones of Needle's Gang

phoenix_fetch_quest_b9.name: Clearing the Air
phoenix_fetch_quest_b9.description: Set up loadspeakers so everyone can unburden themselves of their nauseating secrets.

objectives.description: Deploy Loudspeakers

phoenix_fetch_quest_b5.name: Old News
phoenix_fetch_quest_b5.description: Ray believes that the haunting can be traced back to a single event. Search old newspapers for what could cause such a calamitous curse!

objectives.description: Search old newspapers for information

phoenix_reactivekill_quest_a8.name: Hostile Ventures
phoenix_reactivekill_quest_a8.description: Time to start acting like a hero! Eliminate Husks in a Venture zone

objectives.description: Eliminate Husks

phoenix_killcollect_quest_a12.name: Hats Off
phoenix_killcollect_quest_a12.description: A game of wit, strength, skill, and really big hats! Eliminate Zappers and collect their cowboy hats in a Venture Zone

objectives.description: Eliminate Zappers and collect their cowboy hats in a Power Level [UIRating]+ Venture Zone

phoenix_complete_a13.name: Venture On
phoenix_complete_a13.description: The adventure continues in the Blasted Badlands!

objectives.description: Complete a mission in a Power Level [UIRating]+ Venture Zone

phoenix_fetch_quest_a4.name: Rewind
phoenix_fetch_quest_a4.description: Gather intel on Dennis' dark twin by searching for storm Tracking Cameras in a Venture zone.

objectives.description: Search Security Footage To Discover The Impostor's Origin

phoenix_gathercollect_quest_a1.name: Crude Awakening
phoenix_gathercollect_quest_a1.description: The director needs oil for the failing generators. Destroy oil rigs, gas pumps, or barrels to collect oil in a Venture zone

objectives.description: Destroy Oil Rigs, gas pumps, or barrels to collect Oil

phoenix_complete_a11.name: A Dangerous Venture
phoenix_complete_a11.description: The adventure continues in the Blasted Badlands!

objectives.description: Complete a mission in a Power Level [UIRating]+ Venture Zone

objectives.description: Complete a mission in a Power Level [UIRating]+ Venture Zone

phoenix_survivor_quest_a7.description: Help Dennis complete his training. Rescue survivors in a Venture zone.

objectives.description: Get out there and save some lives!

phoenix_complete_a14.name: The Very Badlands
phoenix_complete_a14.description: The adventure continues in the Blasted Badlands!

objectives.description: Complete a mission in a Power Level [UIRating]+ Venture Zone

phoenix_destroy_quest_a6.name: Crash Course
phoenix_destroy_quest_a6.description: Dennis needs endurance training. Help him destroy vehicles in a Venture zone.

objectives.description: Training continues with a car culling smashfest.

phoenix_gathercollect_quest_a5.name: Venturous Journey
phoenix_gathercollect_quest_a5.description: Dennis is charged with surveying the area. Destroy information kiosks and gather maps in a Venture zone

objectives.description: Collect maps, and chart a path... to the future.

phoenix_destroy_quest_a2.name: Fired
phoenix_destroy_quest_a2.description: Light a fire under Dennis. Destroy campfires and ovens in a Venture zone

objectives.description: Destroy campfires and ovens

phoenix_destroy_quest_a3.name: It's A Sign
phoenix_destroy_quest_a3.description: Signs are directing survivors the wrong way. Help Dennis destroy these road signs in a Venture zone.

objectives.description: Protect survivors by destroying misleading signs.

phoenix_complete_a10.name: Venture Into The Unknown
phoenix_complete_a10.description: The adventure continues in the Blasted Badlands!

objectives.description: Complete a mission in a Power Level [UIRating]+ Venture Zone

phoenix_complete_a9.description: The adventure continues in the Blasted Badlands!

objectives.description: Complete a mission in a Power Level [UIRating]+ Venture Zone

v_fetch_quest_a4.description: Deploy loudspeakers for Val so she can deliver a message to the hiding Major.

objectives.description: Deploy Speakers

v_fetch_quest_a2.name: If This Van's a Ragin'
v_fetch_quest_a2.description: Time to get down to brass tacks, from high above in Lars' Van. Deploy monitoring antennas in the surrounding area.

objectives.description: Deploy Antennas

v_eliminate_quest_a1.name: Major Rager
v_eliminate_quest_a1.description: We've got a Major rage issue on our hands. Take out some husks to cool things down.

objectives.description: Eliminate Husks or Mist Monsters

v_gathercollect_quest_a5.name: Fork Knife
v_gathercollect_quest_a5.description: Help Val prepare the Major for the battles ahead. HINT: Electronics can be found in Industrial areas!

objectives.description: Collect old Electronics for Major's Arm

v_fetch_quest_a7.name: Wordy Shirts
v_fetch_quest_a7.description: Join the Major in a top secret Thank You mission.

objectives.description: Find Major's Gifts

v_eliminate_quest_a6.name: Reload
v_eliminate_quest_a6.description: Join Val and the Major in the field for a husky reintroduction to the the fight.

objectives.description: Eliminate Husks with headshots.

v_survivor_quest_a3.name: Hate to See You Leave
v_survivor_quest_a3.description: If anyone can get through to the Major, it's his favorite student, Val. Rescue survivors while Homebase searches for Val.

objectives.description: Rescue survivors!

phoenix_fetch_quest_c1.name: Let It Slush
phoenix_fetch_quest_c1.description: It's time for a holly jolly do-over. Get the terrible Christmas celebration started by collecting bags of slushy snow to rain down on homebase!

objectives.description: Collect festive bags of slush

phoenix_reactivefetch_quest_c7.name: Tanksgiving
phoenix_reactivefetch_quest_c7.description: With the help of the Misfit Toys, find the worst presents for everyone at Homebase.

objectives.description: Help the Misfit Toys find the worst gifts ever!

phoenix_destroy_quest_c2.name: Twas the Night Before Tuesday
phoenix_destroy_quest_c2.description: Nothing ruins the festive spirit a visit from the Ghost of Christmas Whatever. Help Willow usher in the darkness by destroying street lights. Hint: Best completed in City or Suburban zones.

objectives.description: Destroy street lights.

phoenix_fetch_quest_c10.name: Silent Light
phoenix_fetch_quest_c10.description: The table is set and the plans are in motion. Time to light the candles and let the terrible Christmas unfold.

objectives.description: Light Christmas Candles throughout the land!

phoenix_survivor_quest_c3.name: Dreams
phoenix_survivor_quest_c3.description: Just to be certain everyone is accounted for, Ray calls for an all hands rescue mission. Find and rescue survivors!

objectives.description: Rescue survivors!

phoenix_fetch_quest_c5.name: A Gift You Cannot Refuse
phoenix_fetch_quest_c5.description: Willow has the perfect present to make this a truly terrible Christmas. Track down Willow's gifts before it's too late.

objectives.description: Find and collect Willow's presents

phoenix_gathercollect_quest_c8.name: Sit In
phoenix_gathercollect_quest_c8.description: Jilly's got a plan to throw the most agonizing Christmas dinner the season's ever seen. Help her test-drive the holiday horror on Dennis.

objectives.description: Find your seat, the season's worst dinner party is about to begin.

phoenix_reactivekill_quest_c4.name: Save the Date
phoenix_reactivekill_quest_c4.description: Time to let off a little steam by dealing with the mobs of husks. Get a little practice with your aim and eliminate husks with headshots!

objectives.description: Eliminate Husks with headshots.

phoenix_rescuehero_quest_c6.name: Misfits
phoenix_rescuehero_quest_c6.description: If you really want this to be the worst Christmas ever, you need professionals. It's time to reunite Ted and the Misfit Toys.

objectives.description: Reunite with Ted
Reunite with Jilly Teacup
Reunite with Tank Gatling
