stormking_hidden_hascompletedquest.name: (Hidden) Canny Valley Bossfight Progression Quest
stormking_hidden_hascompletedquest.description: (Hidden) Grants follow up quest to tell players to check email for more information on how to get their physical pin.

objectives.description: (Hidden) Complete Canny Valley Bossfight Quest

stormking_checkemail.name: Storm King Pin
stormking_checkemail.description: Congratulations! You have defeated the Storm King! Check your email over the next several days for information on getting a physical Storm King Pin!

objectives.description: (Hidden) Check Email

bbpromoquest_2019_reactive_jesscabinet.name: Shoot for the High Score!
bbpromoquest_2019_reactive_jesscabinet.description: Find and play the Jess branded Battle Breakers Arcade cabinets (often found in City zones)!

objectives.description: Play Jess Branded Battle Breakers Arcade Cabinets

bbpromoquest_2019_reactive_hiddenspawner.name: Battle Breakers -  Hidden Quest to run mission.
bbpromoquest_2019_reactive_hiddenspawner.description: This quest hides in the background to run things. If you're seeing this in game UI, bug it!

objectives.description: Play Kyle Branded Battle Breakers Arcade Cabinets!

survivalmodequest_plankertondiff_7missio.name: Whatever Gets You Through the Nite
survivalmodequest_plankertondiff_7missio.description:
Successfully complete Survive the Storm missions in a Power 40 or higher zone.

You can access Survive the Storm by selecting the Map tab and then selecting the Survive the Storm pin.

objectives.description: Complete 7 Survive the Storm missions in a [UIRating]+ zone
Complete a 14 Day Survive the Storm mission in a [UIRating] zone

survivalmodequest_anymode_3missions.name: Nite Fever
survivalmodequest_anymode_3missions.description:
Successfully complete Survive the Storm missions in any threat level.

You can access Survive the Storm by selecting the Map tab and then selecting the Survive the Storm pin.

objectives.description: Complete 3 Survive the Storm missions

survivalmodequest_anymode.name: Freestyle Storm Survival
survivalmodequest_anymode.description:
Successfully complete a Survive the Storm mission in any threat level.

You can access Survive the Storm by selecting the Map tab and then selecting the Survive the Storm pin.

objectives.description: Complete a 3, 7, or 14 day Survive the Storm mission

survivalmodequest_14days_d2.name: True Survivor
survivalmodequest_14days_d2.description:
Make it like a True Survivor! Survive a 14 Day mission in a Power 40 zone.

You can access Survive the Storm by selecting the Map tab and then selecting the Survive the Storm pin.

objectives.description: Complete a 14 Day Survive the Storm mission in a [UIRating] zone

survivalmodequest_14days_d1.name: Fortnite for a Fortnight
survivalmodequest_14days_d1.description:
Survive the Storm for 14 days in a Power 15 zone.

You can access Survive the Storm by selecting the Map tab and then selecting the Survive the Storm pin.

objectives.description: Complete a 14 Day Survive the Storm mission in a [UIRating] zone

bot_fetch_quest_a2.name: No Cameras Please
bot_fetch_quest_a2.description: Ray's ready to take her first step into battle, but it's not going to be pretty.

objectives.description: Deactivate surveillance cameras

bot_fetch_quest_a1.name: Lone Wolf-bot
bot_fetch_quest_a1.description: With the rest of the Homebase Crew joining the fight, Ray faces a difficult choice.

objectives.description: Collect movies

bot_reactivekill_quest_a3.name: Ray-Bot Rampage
bot_reactivekill_quest_a3.description: Take cover! Ray-Bot is armed, dangerous, and ready for action.

objectives.description: Eliminate Husks

s13_destroy_quest_a4.name: Sucker Punch
s13_destroy_quest_a4.description: Willow has placed poisoned punch throughout the world to swell Blakebeard's ranks with ghost pirates. Destroy the punch before her diabolical plan can succeed.

objectives.description: Destroy Barrels of Poisoned Punch in Scurvy Shoals

s13_gathercollect_quest_a10.name: Don't Steal My Coconuts
s13_gathercollect_quest_a10.description: One of the most basic rules for survival is to find nourishment. Destroy palm trees to collect coconuts to eat.

objectives.description: Destroy palm trees and collect coconuts in Scurvy Shoals

s13_fetch_quest_a5.name: I See Shanties
s13_fetch_quest_a5.description: Blakebeard's friends wrote sea shanties about the pirate's exploits. Find Boomboxes throughout the land so everyone can hear these catchy tunes.

objectives.description: Find Boomboxes in Scurvy Shoals

s13_rescuesurvivors_quest_a11.name: With Honors
s13_rescuesurvivors_quest_a11.description: Riggs is confident that he is ready for action. Head out into the zone and rescue some survivors!

objectives.description: Rescue survivors in Scurvy Shoals

s13_fetch_quest_a6.name: The Red Doubloons
s13_fetch_quest_a6.description: What is a legendary ghost pirate without a stash of plundered treasure? Find sacks of doubloons to add to Blakebeard's ill-gotten riches.

objectives.description: Collect Stashes of Treasure in Scurvy Shoals

s13_killcollect_quest_a7.name: King Hat
s13_killcollect_quest_a7.description: The highest honor to bestow on a pirate is being crowned a Pirate King. Eliminate Husky Husks and find a suitable crown for Blakebeard.

objectives.description: Eliminate Husky Husks and Collect Crowns in Scurvy Shoals

s13_gathercollect_quest_a9.name: Tales From the Loophole
s13_gathercollect_quest_a9.description: To prove he is hero material, Riggs must find a way to reorient himself when lost in the storm. Destroy runic boulders to find hidden maps and help him find his way.

objectives.description: Destroy runic boulders and collect treasure maps in Scurvy Shoals

s13_destroy_quest_a2.name: Lights Out
s13_destroy_quest_a2.description: The now thoroughly dead pirate Blakebeard, wants to show the worlds of the living and the dead that he is a villain of the highest caliber. To usher in this new age of dread, destroy Lanterns and plunge the world into darkness!

objectives.description: Destroy Lanterns in Scurvy Shoals

s13_killcollect_quest_a8.name: Oh That's What It's Good For
s13_killcollect_quest_a8.description: Now that Blakebeard is satisfied, Riggs is the one in crisis. To get some perspective, hunt lobbers and collect their telescopes to survey the land.

objectives.description: Eliminate Lobbers and Collect Telescopes in Scurvy Shoals

s13_fetch_quest_a3.name: Ghost to Coast
s13_fetch_quest_a3.description: In attempt to show Blakebeard what it really is like in the afterlife, Willow trapped ghosts so they can provide the pirate with accounts of being dead. Find the ghost cages to hear their stories.

objectives.description: Collect Ghost Cages in Scurvy Shoals

s13_landmark_quest_a1.name: Pirate Attack!
s13_landmark_quest_a1.description: Homebase is under attack by a mob of pirates! Complete the Yarrr's Return mission in Scurvy Shoals

objectives.description: Complete Yarrr's Return mission

s11_intro_quest.name: We're Back!
s11_intro_quest.description: Thank you for your patience. Complete Homebase Storm Shield Defense 1 to collect your reward!
s11_intro_quest.completionText: Sorry we destroyed time! Thank you for understanding! Enjoy your reward!

objectives.description: Complete Homebase Storm Shield Defense 1

halloweenquest_savesurvivors.name: Trick or Treat
halloweenquest_savesurvivors.description: Survivors need us now more than ever, Commander. Let's rescue them. Rumor has it, they have some candy.

objectives.description: Save 15 Survivors
Complete 3 Medium Threat (or higher) Missions in Stonewood

halloweenquest_plankertonmissions.name: Fright Zone
halloweenquest_plankertonmissions.description: Now that we've defeated the Lobbers in Stonewood, let's take the fight to the husks in Plankerton.

objectives.description: Complete 5 Medium Threat (or higher) Missions in Plankerton

halloweenquest_findgravestones.name: Secrets Taken to the Grave
halloweenquest_findgravestones.description: As I suspected, these pumpkins are evil. Which gives me an idea. If you can find missing step of the Jack-O-Launcher schematic, you can build the perfect weapon. Try looking somewhere spooky like the suburbs.

objectives.description: Search Gravestones for the Epitaph in Stonewood
Complete 3 High Threat (or higher) Missions in Stonewood

halloweenquest_cannyvalleymissions.name: The Haunting Never Dies
halloweenquest_cannyvalleymissions.description: You are now ready to take on the hauntings in Canny Valley. Take down the husks, Commander. Master your fears!

objectives.description: Complete 5 Medium Threat (or higher) Missions in Canny Valley
Clear 6 Husk Encampments in High Threat (or higher) Stonewood
Complete 2 High Threat (or higher) Missions in Stonewood
Eliminate 20 Pumpkin Husks in Stonewood
Complete 2 Missions in Stonewood
Craft the Jack-O-Launcher
Eliminate 6 Lobbers in Very High Threat Stonewood with a Jack-O-Launcher
Complete 1 Very High Threat Mission in Stonewood

stormquest_2018_reactive_acparts.name: Cleverboards
stormquest_2018_reactive_acparts.description: Commander, I have come up with a foolproof hoverboard based plan to track Carlos down! The only problem is, these hoverboards are idiots! I need your help. Searching rooftops for AC units should help us find the parts we need. Found in Urban, Suburban and Industrial zones.
stormquest_2018_reactive_acparts.completionText: No time to brief the hoverboards! Let's get moving!

objectives.description: Gather AC control circuits from AC units for the Smart Hoverboards

stormquest_2018_reactive_speakers.name: Encore
stormquest_2018_reactive_speakers.description: Lars is ready to rock. Who are we to stand in the way?
stormquest_2018_reactive_speakers.completionText: Lars' old research partner and Steel Wool Bassist might still be alive!

objectives.description: Deploy speakers and blast Steel Wool's greatest hits to repel the storm

stormquest_2018_completestormzones_repea.name: Endless Storms
stormquest_2018_completestormzones_repea.description: Storms are rapidly spreading. Look at all that purple turbulance on the map! Complete some missions in those hexes. Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

objectives.description: Complete 2 Mutant Storm missions

stormquest_2018_completesurvive7day_d2.name: The Will to Survive
stormquest_2018_completesurvive7day_d2.description:
Survive a 7 Day mission in a Power 40 zone.

You can access Survive the Storm by selecting the Map tab and then selecting the Survive the Storm pin.

objectives.description: Complete a 7 Day Survive the Storm in a [UIRating] zone

stormquest_2018_completesurvive7day_d1.name: Against All Odds
stormquest_2018_completesurvive7day_d1.description:
Survive the Storm for 7 days in a Power 15 zone.

You can access Survive the Storm by selecting the Map tab and then selecting the Survive the Storm pin.

objectives.description: Complete a 7 Day Survive the Storm in a [UIRating] zone

stormquest_2018_reactive_payphones.name: What's A Payphone?
stormquest_2018_reactive_payphones.description: The Hover Fleet is calling back! Track down payphones to collect their reports. Found in Urban, Suburban and Industrial zones.
stormquest_2018_reactive_payphones.completionText: Word of advice, never cross a Hover Fleet.

objectives.description: Find public payphones the smart hoverboards are calling and retrieve the data
(Hidden) Complete StormQuest_2018_Reactive_SkyAtlases

stormquest_2018_reactive_huskdata.name: Its What's Inside That Counts
stormquest_2018_reactive_huskdata.description: We need husk data... the gross kind of husk data. So take no prisoners and collect all samples!
stormquest_2018_reactive_huskdata.completionText: Hmm. Tests conclude there's nothing remarkable about this husk slurry you collected. That's strange...

objectives.description: Eliminate and collect mist monster data

stormquest_2018_completesurviveany.name: Into The Storm
stormquest_2018_completesurviveany.description:
Successfully complete Survive the Storm missions in any threat level.

You can access Survive the Storm by selecting the Map tab and then selecting the Survive the Storm pin.
stormquest_2018_completesurviveany.completionText: You live to fight another day!

objectives.description: Complete 3 Survive the Storm missions

stormquest_2018_reactive_equipment.name: Last Known Position
stormquest_2018_reactive_equipment.description: Lars has asked us not to search for Carlos. So let's play it cool... as we search the rooftops for Carlos' research equipment. Found mostly in Urban, Suburban and Industrial zones.
stormquest_2018_reactive_equipment.completionText: Carlos was last seen in the Southwest near Thunder Route 99.

objectives.description: Find and interact with the research equipment someone's been installing on the rooftops

stormquest_2018_reactive_records.name: Liner Notes
stormquest_2018_reactive_records.description: Steel Wool mania is sweeping Homebase. Scour the streets for anything Steel Wool related. Found mostly in Urban and Suburban zones.
stormquest_2018_reactive_records.completionText: When Lars asks for speakers, you know it's going to get loud.

objectives.description: Look for Steel Wool album records

stormquest_2018_completesurvive7day_d3.name: Only the Strong Survive
stormquest_2018_completesurvive7day_d3.description:
A 7 Day mission in a Power 70 zone? Can you survive?

You can access Survive the Storm by selecting the Map tab and then selecting the Survive the Storm pin.

objectives.description: Complete a 7 Day Survive the Storm in a [UIRating] zone

stormquest_2018_reactive_servers.name: Van Down!
stormquest_2018_reactive_servers.description: Help Lars restore his van's systems by collecting backup data from any server racks you can find. Found mostly in Urban and Industrial zones.
stormquest_2018_reactive_servers.completionText: The Van is back in action!

objectives.description: Find server clusters in the world and use them for some number-crunching

stormquest_2018_reactive_insulators.name: Iron Van
stormquest_2018_reactive_insulators.description: Lars is not going to like it, but we need to upgrade his van for the journey into the storm.Gather the insulators from electrical transformers. Found mostly in Industrial zones.

objectives.description: Find insulators from power transformers around the world

stormquest_2018_reactive_servicecars.name: Breaker! Breaker!
stormquest_2018_reactive_servicecars.description: Lars' van can't keep up with the strange new developments in the sky. Blast open the Van's doors of perception by collecting encrypted radio components from emergency response vehicles.
stormquest_2018_reactive_servicecars.completionText: So much purple... but what does it mean?

objectives.description: Destroy firetrucks, police cars and ambulances to retrieve Encrypted Radio parts

stormquest_2018_reactive_research.name: Deep Cuts
stormquest_2018_reactive_research.description: Lars' sensor upgrade is a success, but no one can understand the new data. The answer to this strange data may lie in Lars' past. Search any basements to find Lars' old research. Found in Urban, Suburban and Industrial zones.
stormquest_2018_reactive_research.completionText: Lars has the research materials he needs, but more importantly we have our very own Steel Wool album.

objectives.description: Find Lars's old research data

stormquest_2018_reactive_skyatlases.name: Stars, Man.
stormquest_2018_reactive_skyatlases.description: Lars hasn't slept in days and his vital signs do not look good. Let's check in to see what he needs before he crashes his van. The sky atlases can be found mostly in Urban and Suburban zones.
stormquest_2018_reactive_skyatlases.completionText: We have mapped the stars! The good ones at least.

objectives.description: Find sky atlas parts by destroying bookshelves

stormquest_2018_reactive_maps.name: Oh, Wait. Maps!
stormquest_2018_reactive_maps.description: If we're going to head out west, we'll need maps. Search the industrial zone for vehicles likely to have maps. Trucks are easiest to find in Industrial zones.

objectives.description: Gather maps from Trucks and RVs

stormquest_2018_reactive_telescopes.name: Eye Spy
stormquest_2018_reactive_telescopes.description: Lars wants telescopes... I have no idea why. Search for telescope parts and I'll figure our what Lars is up to. Found in Urban, Suburban and Industrial zones.
stormquest_2018_reactive_telescopes.completionText: Time to scope out the world beyond Homebase!

objectives.description: Find broken telescopes that we could use to construct a telescope array

stormquest_2018_landmark_lars.name: Steel Icarus
stormquest_2018_landmark_lars.description: Launch Lars deep into the storm!

objectives.description: Launch Lars beyond the wall of clouds

stormquest_2018_reactive_hoverboards.name: Hover Over Yonder
stormquest_2018_reactive_hoverboards.description: We don't have time to train the hoverfleet, but I think they'll figure it out. Head out and launch those brilliant boards!
stormquest_2018_reactive_hoverboards.completionText: The fleet is hovering off into the unknown!

objectives.description: Deploy smart hoverboards on their journey

stormquest_2018_landmark_observe.name: Reunion Tour
stormquest_2018_landmark_observe.description: It's time to finish Carlos' research! Protect the telescope array until the results come in!
stormquest_2018_landmark_observe.completionText: The data is coming in, and rumors of a Steel Wool reunion are flying, nice work!

objectives.description: Defend the telescope array (4 telescopes) while they are observing the sky

halloweenquest_killvlad.name: Stakeout
halloweenquest_killvlad.description: Find and destroy Storm's recreation of the ancient Hexsylvanian tyrant!  Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Eliminate Vlad in a successful mission

s11_reactivekill_quest_g4.name: Slayride
s11_reactivekill_quest_g4.description: Remind Willow of some of her favorite haunts by eliminating Husks with traps.

objectives.description: Eliminate enemies with traps

s11_fetch_quest_g7.name: There's No Place Like Van for the Holidays
s11_fetch_quest_g7.description: Join Lars and Willow to deliver gifts to the survivors and spread hope and joy to everyone!

objectives.description: Deliver gifts to survivors

s11_killcollect_quest_g5.name: Mist-letoe
s11_killcollect_quest_g5.description: There's another holiday tradition that Homebase would like to try to break Willow out of her funk - mistletoe! The standard variety won't work for ghosts. Eliminate husks to find ghost mistletoe. Hint: Not all husks drop ghost mistletoe.

objectives.description: Eliminate husks to find ghost mistletoe

s11_fetch_quest_g3.name: All I Want For Christmas is Boo
s11_fetch_quest_g3.description: Dennis wants to make Willow a delicious ghost meal, but needs some help to find what ghosts eat. Hint: Best completed in a City or Suburban zone.

objectives.description: Search book piles for ghost cookbooks

s11_gathercollect_quest_g2.name: O Ghostmas Tree
s11_gathercollect_quest_g2.description: To help Willow feel like she's not alone, Ray has decided to create ghost trees. Destroy beds to collect bedsheets. Hint: Best completed in a City or Suburban zone.

objectives.description: Gather bedsheets by destroying beds

s11_landmark_quest_g6.name: We Wish You a Merry Fright Maze
s11_landmark_quest_g6.description: The best gifts are personal. For Willow, that's a giant maze she can haunt.

objectives.description: Build a maze for Willow to haunt in Crackshot's Neighborhood

s11_fetch_quest_g1.name: No Sleep 'Til...
s11_fetch_quest_g1.description: Homebase is having trouble sleeping, so it's time to make the best of the situation. Collect coffee makers to help keep the team awake. Hint: Best completed in a City or Suburban zone.

objectives.description: Collect coffee makers

s11_fetch_quest_h3.name: The Bean Plan
s11_fetch_quest_h3.description: Ray has been deposed and exiled from Homebase. She has a plan and she needs beans to pull it off.

objectives.description: Collect cans of beans

s11_protectsurvivor_quest_h1.name: [PH] Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Outlander
s11_protectsurvivor_quest_h1.description: [PH] Homebase picked up a strange transmission. It sounds like someone needs help!

objectives.description: [PH] Find and protect the Tinkerer

s11_fetch_quest_h6.name: Tea And Sympathy
s11_fetch_quest_h6.description: Ray is going to help Jilly make amends and there's no better way than breaking bread with those she has wronged, or - in this case - sharing tea.

objectives.description: Set up apology tea parties

s11_rescuehero_quest_h1.name: Day Of The Living Ted
s11_rescuehero_quest_h1.description: A survivor named Ted is on the run and needs Homebase's help. Find him in the storm and bring him back to safety.

objectives.description: Find and rescue Ted

s11_landmark_quest_h4.name: Toying With Your Emotions
s11_landmark_quest_h4.description: Ted has been sentenced to die! There must be a lawyer among the survivors who can plead his case.

objectives.description: Rescue survivors to find a defense attorney

s11_reactivefetch_quest_h7.name: Monkey Times
s11_reactivefetch_quest_h7.description: Ted and his creations are set on reclaiming his creative spark. Find crafting supplies to help: a mannequin head, sewing machine, collection of thread, bolts of cloth, and cans of dye.

objectives.description: Collect crafting supplies for Ted
Collect Thread
Collect Bolts of Cloth
Collect Mannequin Head
Collect Dye
Collect Sewing Machine

s11_killcollect_quest_h5.name: I Am the Law... Apparently
s11_killcollect_quest_h5.description: Sgt. Tank Gatling demands a trial by combat by eliminating Zappers in the area. Eliminate them and collect dense violentium to prove your case.

objectives.description: Eliminate Zapper husks and gather dense violentium

s11_destroy_quest_h2.name: The Rise of Jilly
s11_destroy_quest_h2.description: Jilly is tired of the other toys stealing her spotlight. Destroy as many as you can find!  Hint: Best completed in City or Suburban zones.

objectives.description: Destroy toys

s11_landmark_quest_f1.name: Holly Jolly Ransom
s11_landmark_quest_f1.description: Crackshot has been kidnapped! Collect pieces of the ransom note and discover the kidnappers' demands.

objectives.description: Investigate Crackshot's kidnapping

s11_fetch_quest_f7.name: A Hopeful Song
s11_fetch_quest_f7.description: Celebrate the holidays by blaring music from speakers for all to hear, whether they like it or not. Hint: Best completed in a Protect the Presents mission.

objectives.description: Deploy speakers to spread holiday cheer

s11_gathercollect_quest_f0.name: Bonus: Needle in a Haystack
s11_gathercollect_quest_f0.description: Finding a needle in a haystack may not be as difficult as everyone says it is. Hint: Must be completed in a Protect the Presents mission.

objectives.description: Find the needle

s11_reactivekill_quest_f0.name: Bonus: More Holiday Fear
s11_reactivekill_quest_f0.description: Husks continue to make a mockery of the holidays. Crackshot is satisfied with the current spread of holiday fear, but more would make him even more joyful! Hint: Must be completed in a Protect the Presents mission.
s11_reactivekill_quest_f0.completionText: Santa Husky Husks and Mrs. Claus Lobbers eliminated!

objectives.description: Eliminate more Santa Husky Husks and Mrs. Claus Lobbers

s11_gathercollect_quest_f4.name: Bring Me Santa's Head
s11_gathercollect_quest_f4.description: Crackshot has demanded Santa's head. Ray has a different idea. Collect newspapers to create paper-mache. Hint: Best completed in a Protect the Presents mission.

objectives.description: Gather papers from newsstands

s11_fetch_quest_fgift.name: Bonus: Crackshot's Treasure
s11_fetch_quest_fgift.description: Use the mysterious key to unlock Crackshot's secret holiday treasure - a gift to you! Hint: Must be completed in a Protect the Presents mission.

objectives.description: Use the key to unlock Crackshot's hidden treasure

s11_fetch_quest_f3.name: The Holiday's Hottest Toy
s11_fetch_quest_f3.description: Crackshot demands the holiday season's hottest toy. Find it, or else! Hint: Best completed in a Protect the Presents mission.

objectives.description: Find presents for Crackshot

s11_destroy_quest_f0.name: Bonus: Cracking Down
s11_destroy_quest_f0.description: Find and destroy Crackshot's favorite decoration in Crackshot's Neighborhood. Hint: Must be completed in a Protect the Presents mission.

objectives.description: Destroy Crackshot's favorite decoration

s11_gathercollect_quest_f6.name: His Heart Grew Five Sizes
s11_gathercollect_quest_f6.description: It is time for Crackshot to learn his valuable lesson. Collect expired energy drinks to help him become a large-hearted holiday hero. Hint: Best completed in a Protect the Presents mission.

objectives.description: Destroy vending machines to gather energy drinks

s11_fetch_quest_f5.name: Stockings Must Hang
s11_fetch_quest_f5.description: Spread holiday cheer by decorating trees in Crackshot's Neighborhood. Hint: Best completed in a Protect the Presents mission.

objectives.description: Decorate trees for the holidays

s11_fetch_quest_fkey.name: Bonus: Crackshot's Key
s11_fetch_quest_fkey.description: Crackshot has lost the key to his holiday treasure. Hint: Must be completed in a Protect the Presents mission.

objectives.description: Find Crackshot's lost key

halloweenquest_2017_epicheroes.name: Epic Monster Bash!
halloweenquest_2017_epicheroes.description: Complete the Hex Files Quest in Hexsylvania.

objectives.description: Complete Hex Files Quest
Complete Loot Drop Quest
(Hidden) Complete Destroy 7 Quest
(Hidden) Complete Destroy 8 Quest

halloweenquest_2017_trainhero.name: Bloodfinder A.C. Training
halloweenquest_2017_trainhero.description: Visit the Command tab to level up Bloodfinder A.C..

objectives.description: Level Up Bloodfinder A.C. to Level 20
(Hidden) Complete Destroy 1 Quest
(Hidden) Complete Destroy 2 Quest

anniversaryquest_2018_complete_cake_repe.description: Celebrate a year of Fortnite with some delicious cake! Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

objectives.description: Find birthday cakes in successful missions

s10_fetch_quest_a10.description: Help set up a tribunal for Dark Ray by collecting judge wigs.

objectives.description: Collect judge wigs

s10_gathercollect_quest_a14.name: Long Road Home
s10_gathercollect_quest_a14.description: Destroy cabinets and collect canned supplies to prepare Dennis Jr. for his return to his own reality.

objectives.description: Destroy cabinets and collect cans of food

s10_fetch_quest_a12.name: The Big Slurp
s10_fetch_quest_a12.description: Deploy sensor balloons to help Lars determine if reality is collapsing.

objectives.description: Deploy Sensor Balloon

s10_gathercollect_quest_a6.name: It's a Lot to Give
s10_gathercollect_quest_a6.description: Help Ned escape his time loop by destroying fire trucks, police cars, and ambulances to collect nedkits.

objectives.description: Destroy fire trucks, police cars, and ambulances to collect nedkits

s10_gathercollect_quest_a9.name: Deadbeat
s10_gathercollect_quest_a9.description: Destroy book cases and collect "Psychology for Dummies" books in suburban or urban zones.

objectives.description: Destroy bookcases to collect books

s10_landmark_quest_a1.name: Comet Jr.
s10_landmark_quest_a1.description: Gather intel at the site of the meteor impact.

objectives.description: Investigate the meteor

s10_fetch_quest_a4.name: Tell Me Everything
s10_fetch_quest_a4.description: Find boxes of hypnosis equipment to help jog Dennis Jr.'s memory.

objectives.description: Find boxes of hypnosis materials

s10_fetch_quest_a3.name: And Dennis Jr. Makes Three
s10_fetch_quest_a3.description: Search for DNA testing equipment for Dennis Jr. Hint: Best found in urban, suburban, or industrial zones.

objectives.description: Find DNA blood testing equipment

summerquest_2019_kill_wargames.name: Party Games
summerquest_2019_kill_wargames.description: Nothing gets a party started like a fun ice breaker. Get the fun started with some Wargames. Access Wargames from the Storm Shield Computer in your Homebase or by assisting other players via Neighborhood Watch.

objectives.description: Complete two Wargames simulations

summerquest_2019_kill_mist.name: Summer Bummer
summerquest_2019_kill_mist.description: We have reports of misty party crashers. Take 'em out!

objectives.description: Eliminate mist monsters of any type
Rescue survivors

summerquest_2019_kill_melee.name: Batter Up!
summerquest_2019_kill_melee.description: Warm up for the 2nd annual Homebase Softball Extravaganza by taking a swing at some husks.

objectives.description: Eliminate husks with melee

summerquest_2019_kill_200.name: Party Crashers
summerquest_2019_kill_200.description: We've got party crashers! Take 'em out!

objectives.description: Eliminate husks

summerquest_2019_complete_all.name: Take a Bow
summerquest_2019_complete_all.description: The party was a smash success, take a bow. You deserve it.
summerquest_2019_complete_all.completionText: All 14 Days of Summer quests complete!

objectives.description: Complete "Get Ready to Party..."
Complete "Make That a COLD Drink"
Complete "Batter Up!"
Complete "Party Games"
Complete "Towel off!"
Complete "Hit the Hoops"
Complete "Summer Bummer"
Complete "Party Decor"
Complete "Find the Fun"
Complete "Light'em Up"
Complete "Party Crashers"
Complete "No Mow"
Complete "Beat the Heat"
Complete "Did We Forget Something?"

blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_chromehus.name: Sometimes They Come Back
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_chromehus.description: We've got new monsters! Take out Chrome Husks and collect samples for analysis.
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_chromehus.completionText: The results are in! Chrome Husks have a weakness to fire, and ice elemental weapons and traps.

objectives.description: Collect Chrome Husk Data

blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_broadcast.name: We Interrupt This Broadcast...
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_broadcast.description: The TVs around the world are broadcasting ominous messages. We need to investigate - destroy the TVs and collect corrupted receivers to understand what is happening. Something is corrupting the receivers, but it is not the storm. TVs are most often found in Suburban and Urban zones.

objectives.description: Collect Television Receivers

blockbusterquest_2018_killfirehusks_repe.name: When Fire Husks Start to Burn
blockbusterquest_2018_killfirehusks_repe.description:
Now that you have access to a Perk Recombobulator, eliminate as many Fire Husks as you can to earn PERK-UPs to power it. Note: This is a repeatable Quest. Fire Husks can be found in Plankerton or higher areas.

The Perk Recombobulator feature is available after completing the Plankerton Storm Shield Defense 2 Quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate 300 Fire Husks in successful missions

blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_tombstone.name: Every Film Bed, Woof!
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_tombstone.completionText: The Cloaked Star needs our help. We need to find a way to save him from himself.

objectives.description: Search Smashed Gravestones
Destroy Tank Trucks To Collect Steel

blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_retrievec.name: Don't Blink
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_retrievec.description: We need glass to build our lasers. Collect SEE-bots to search for evidence of lightning glass.

objectives.description: Collect SEE-bots

blockbusterquest_2018_killchromehusky_re.name: Enter the Chrome Husky
blockbusterquest_2018_killchromehusky_re.description:
Now that you have access to a Perk Recombobulator, eliminate as many Chrome Husky Husks as you can to earn PERK-UPs to power it. Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

The Perk Recombobulator feature is available after completing the Plankerton Storm Shield Defense 2 Quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate a Chrome Husky in a successful mission

blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_mayhem.name: Renegade Rampage
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_mayhem.description: It looks like there's a new vigilante in town. Follow the path of destruction and search for clues for the vigilante's identity.

objectives.description: Follow The Trail Of Destruction

blockbusterquest_2018_landmark_meteor.name: Meteoric Fall
blockbusterquest_2018_landmark_meteor.completionText: We win! That smoking crater is now a... smoking crater.

objectives.description: Destroy The Meteorite

blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_cows.name: I Have No Voice and I Must Moo
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_cows.completionText: Moo. Moo moo moo moo? Moo.

objectives.description: Collect Farm Sounds

blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_barrels.name: Ooze Control
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_barrels.description: Spitfire is missing, and toxic waste barrels are popping up in unexpected places. Search the barrels and discover the connection.
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_barrels.completionText: Spitfire needs our help. We have to find a way to bring him home without endangering everyone in Homebase.

objectives.description: Search Barrels

blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_magnets.name: Magnets!
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_magnets.description: The Cloaked Star might have a solution for the Chrome Husk infestation. Stand by to deploy magnetic snares!

objectives.description: Deploy Magnetic Snares

blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_bees.name: The Powers That Bee
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_bees.description: Some heroes aren't born, they're made. Eliminate Bee Hive husks and collect corrupted beehive pieces for Lok's super experiment.
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_bees.completionText: No bees were harmed in the completion of this quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate Beehive Husks And Collect Corrupted Beehive Pieces.

blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_mattresse.name: Sleep On It
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_mattresse.description: We've saved so many survivors we're running out of beds. Search the area for suitable mattresses. Beds are mostly found in Suburban and Urban zones.

objectives.description: Collect Mattresses

blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_cometshar.name: It Came From Space!
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_cometshar.description: We should probably investigate that massive explosion. Search the zone for any signs of the meteorite.
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_cometshar.completionText: Bad news! The meteorite shards have destroyed our scanning equipment. Be careful out there.

objectives.description: Collect Meteorite Shards

blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_portapott.name: Jack Of All Trades
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_portapott.description: Homebase plumbing is crisis waiting to happen. Help Jack collect everything we need to stave off disaster. Look for portable toilets in the Industrial Zones.

objectives.description: Collect Neutralizer Fluid
(Hidden) Complete BlockbusterQuest_2018_Reactive_RaySignal

blockbusterquest_2018_killwaterhusks_rep.name: Don't Be Like Water Husks
blockbusterquest_2018_killwaterhusks_rep.description:
Now that you have access to a Perk Recombobulator, eliminate as many Water Husks as you can to earn PERK-UPs to power it. Note: This is a repeatable Quest. Water Husks can be found in Plankerton or higher areas.

The Perk Recombobulator feature is available after completing the Plankerton Storm Shield Defense 2 Quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate 300 Water Husks in successful missions
Collect Testing Equipment

blockbusterquest_2018_killnaturehusks_re.name: One with Nature Husks
blockbusterquest_2018_killnaturehusks_re.description:
Now that you have access to a Perk Recombobulator, eliminate as many Nature Husks as you can to earn PERK-UPs to power it. Note: This is a repeatable Quest. Nature Husks can be found in Plankerton or higher areas.

The Perk Recombobulator feature is available after completing the Plankerton Storm Shield Defense 2 Quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate 300 Nature Husks in successful missions

blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_flyers.name: Super Flyers
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_flyers.description: You can't battle a mysterious space rock without a team of super-powered superheroes! Let's let the superhero community know we're recruiting!

objectives.description: Launch Flyers

blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_mailboxes.name: Post Credits
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_mailboxes.description: Replies are piling up from Lok's superhero job posting. Search mailboxes to find a true hero.

objectives.description: Search Mailboxes
(Hidden) Complete BlockbusterQuest_2018_Landmark_Meteor
Deploy SEE-bots
(Hidden) Complete BlockbusterQuest_2018_Reactive_Magnets Quest

blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_raysignal.name: Ray Of Hope
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_raysignal.description: It's time for Lok's reign of terror to come to an end. Deploy searchlights to call Ray back to Homebase.

objectives.description: Deploy Lights
Collect Shielder Data
Rescue The Cloaked Star

blockbusterquest_2018_landmark_comet.name: Space Rocks
blockbusterquest_2018_landmark_comet.description: We're closing in on the landing site. Search the zone for the crater, deploy scanning equipment, and get ready to fight!
blockbusterquest_2018_landmark_comet.completionText: Our scans show the corrosive radiation from the meteorite is spreading! Fall back to Homebase!

objectives.description: Deploy and Defend Scanners

blockbusterquest_2018_killminibosses_rep.name: One "Mini-Boss" at a Time
blockbusterquest_2018_killminibosses_rep.description: Eliminate as many Epic Mini-Bosses as you can, Commander! Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate an Epic Mini-Boss in a successful Mini-Boss mission
(Hidden) Watch Blockbuster Video

blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_fans.name: Bee Gone
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_fans.description: Help Ray collect fans to clear the bees from Homebase. Found inside houses and buildings.

objectives.description: Collect Fans

blockbusterquest_2018_killmistmonsters_r.name: Mist Monster Bash
blockbusterquest_2018_killmistmonsters_r.description:
Now that you have access to a Perk Recombobulator, eliminate as many Mist Monsters as you can to earn PERK-UPs to power it. Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

The Perk Recombobulator feature is available after completing the Plankerton Storm Shield Defense 2 Quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate 50 Mist Monsters in successful missions

blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_consoles.name: Project Tailor
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_consoles.completionText: The Project Tailor audio logs should help us design a suit powerful enough to withstand meteorite corrosion.

objectives.description: Find Project Tailor Files

blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_clocks.name: Handshake
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_clocks.description: Help Dennis prove the existence of time skips by collecting clock parts. Clocks are most often found in Urban and Suburban zones.
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_clocks.completionText: It turns out a lot of things move in an earthquake, Dennis.

objectives.description: Collect Clocks
Deploy Remote Seismographs

blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_julyfourt.name: Independence Day
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_julyfourt.description: Celebrate the independence of our Home Base with a display of festive fireworks!

objectives.description: Launch Fireworks

blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_toys.name: Baby Daddy
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_toys.description: Collect stuffed animals to prepare Dennis for the biggest journey of his life. Toys are most often found in Suburban and Urban zones.

objectives.description: Collect Stuffed Animals

blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_scanners.name: Malevolent Presence
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_scanners.completionText: The malicious network is somewhere close by. Dennis is standing by to help.

objectives.description: Deploy Scanners

blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_rubber.name: Ex-Ray
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_rubber.completionText: Nice work. We almost have everything we need to build the suit.

objectives.description: Collect High Density Rubber

blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_restauran.name: Taste Wizard
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_restauran.description: The Taste Wizard predictive ordering network has been corrupted by the storm. Help Dennis destroy Taste Wizard before it destroys us all. The restaurants are most often found in Urban zones.
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_restauran.completionText: It worked! Malicious network activity is declining rapidly.

objectives.description: Test The Suit

blockbusterquest_2018_opencaches_repeata.name: Fortune and Glory
blockbusterquest_2018_opencaches_repeata.description:
Now that you have access to a Perk Recombobulator, open as many caches as you can to earn PERK-UPs to power it. You can find caches in the world by killing Mini-Bosses or looting valuable treasure chests. Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

The Perk Recombobulator feature is available after completing the Plankerton Storm Shield Defense 2 Quest.

objectives.description: Open 10 Caches

blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_carbondat.name: Carbon Dating
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_carbondat.description: We should check to see if the chrome husks are from the future. Just to be sure. Collect a sample for carbon dating.
blockbusterquest_2018_reactive_carbondat.completionText: The carbon dating results are inconclusive. Dennis might actually be right.

objectives.description: Collect Sample
Survive for 30 minutes in a single mission of Top it Off
Survive for 45 minutes in a single mission of Top it Off
Deposit at least one BluGlo every wave for 10 waves in a single mission of Top it Off
Complete Wave 20 in Top it Off

s11_holdfastquest_frosty_30.name: A Crunch of Snow
s11_holdfastquest_frosty_30.description: Just listen to the quiet fall of snow; crunchy, isn't it? Makes you wanna go out and frolic among the husks, taking a swing at them every now and then, spring a few traps, you know, the usual! See you in 30?

objectives.description: Survive for 30 minutes in a single mission of Frosty Turf
Complete Wave 20 in Frosty Turf
Eliminate 100 husks with traps in Frosty Turf
Survive for 45 minutes in a single mission of Frosty Turf
Complete Wave 20 in Merry Melee
Survive for 45 minutes in a single mission of Merry Melee
Survive for 30 minutes in a single mission of Merry Melee
Craft an epic or better melee weapon in Merry Melee
Survive for 30 minutes in a single mission of Final Frost

s11_holdfastquest_legend_15.name: Reaching for Greatness
s11_holdfastquest_legend_15.description: You only get so many shots, so go. Each time, higher and higher as you chase that status. This is but a stepping stone.

objectives.description: Complete Wave 15 in Final Frost

s11_holdfastquest_legend_elite.name: The Legends of the Frost
s11_holdfastquest_legend_elite.description: The longest and darkest night is here. It is the Final Frost. But remember as they say; It is darkest before the dawn. Survive the Final Frost, so we may raise our mugs to you, once you become Legends.

objectives.description: Complete Wave 20 in Final Frost

s11_holdfastquest_legend_45.name: A Tale to Tell
s11_holdfastquest_legend_45.description: Folk tales and heroes are hardly the stuff of Legend. But they have the potential to be. Write me a tale to tell, if you can. 45 minutes is all it takes, now go.

objectives.description: Survive for 45 minutes in a single mission of Final Frost

s11_holdfastquest_deliver_30.name: Gopher
s11_holdfastquest_deliver_30.description: Gopher! Deliver the BluGlo! Chop Chop! Those dispensers have to make it at least past 30 minutes or my - I mean, Our - supply will dip! Get going!

objectives.description: Survive for 30 minutes in a single mission of Special Delivery
Complete Wave 20 in Special Delivery

s11_holdfastquest_deliver_45.name: Mailman
s11_holdfastquest_deliver_45.description: Mail Call! Mail Call! I need this BluGlo delivered to your burner! Stay out there for at least 45 minutes while I redraw supply routes and other jargon-y stuff!

objectives.description: Survive for 45 minutes in a single mission of Special Delivery

s11_holdfastquest_deliver_bluglo.name: Keep your hands off my BluGlo!

objectives.description: Complete Wave 11 with all BluGlo dispensers intact.

s11_holdfastquest_superhot_45.name: Warming Your Hands
s11_holdfastquest_superhot_45.description: I got the furnace a-blazin. That oughtta keep out the cold. But them darn Husks want the heat too, I bet. They just keep coming. Think you can run on for 45 minutes this time?

objectives.description: Survive for 45 minutes in a single mission of Superheated
Complete Wave 20 in Superheated
Survive for 30 minutes in a single mission of Superheated
Place 100 Structures in Superheated
Survive for 8 waves in a single mission of New Wave Holiday
Eliminate 50 Target Husks with Melee Weapons in the New Wave Holiday
Eliminate 50 Target Husks with Shotgun Weapons in the New Wave Holiday
Eliminate 50 Target Husks with Assault Rifle Weapons in the New Wave Holiday
Eliminate 50 Target Husks with Pistol Weapons in the New Wave Holiday
Eliminate 50 Target Husks with Sniper Rifle Weapons in the New Wave Holiday
Survive for 12 waves in a single mission of New Wave Holiday
Complete Wave 20 in New Wave Holiday

s11_holdfastquest_season_survive_15.name: Survival Basics
s11_holdfastquest_season_survive_15.description: The night is upon us! Do whatever it takes to survive 15 minutes in Frostnite!

objectives.description: Survive for 15 minutes in a single Frostnite Mission

s11_holdfastquest_season_trapcraft.name: Cold Traps
s11_holdfastquest_season_trapcraft.description: Craft 50 traps of Rare or higher rarity (Only available in Frostnite)

objectives.description: Craft 50 Rare (or higher) Traps in Frostnite

s11_holdfastquest_season_burner.name: Burner Fuel
s11_holdfastquest_season_burner.description: Keep that burner topped off with BluGlo! (Only available in Frostnite)

objectives.description: Deposit 200 BluGlo into the Burner in Frostnite

s11_holdfastquest_season_survive_30.name: Winter Survival
s11_holdfastquest_season_survive_30.description: The night is upon us! Do whatever it takes to survive 30 minutes in Frostnite!

objectives.description: Survive for 30 minutes in a single Frostnite Mission

s11_holdfastquest_season_loot.name: Cold Hard Cache
s11_holdfastquest_season_loot.description: Restock our supplies by looting as many hidden chests or safes as you can! (Only available in Frostnite)

objectives.description: Loot 40 Chests (or safes) in Frostnite

s11_holdfastquest_season_survive_45.name: Polar Survival
s11_holdfastquest_season_survive_45.description: The night is upon us! Do whatever it takes to survive 45 minutes in Frostnite!

objectives.description: Survive for 45 minutes in a single Frostnite Mission
Keep the BluGlo Furnace above 50% for more than 10 Waves

s11_holdfastquest_season_misty.name: Mist of the North
s11_holdfastquest_season_misty.description: Eliminate as many Mist Monsters as you can. (Only available in Frostnite)

objectives.description: Eliminate 50 Mist Monsters in Frostnite
Explore the entire map in a single mission of Frostnite
Survive a total of 30 waves in Frostnite (Note: This is a repeatable quest)
Break out BluGlo from Ice Blocks in Frostnite 3 times in a single mission (Note: This is a repeatable quest)

s11_holdfastquest_seasonelite_knight.name: Frost Knight
s11_holdfastquest_seasonelite_knight.description: Finish all of the waves of Frostnite in the most difficult zone! (Non-challenge missions only)

objectives.description: Complete Wave 20 of Frostnite in a 128+ Power zone
Complete Wave 20 of Frostnite in a group with one of each class.

s11_holdfastquest_seasonelite_cramps.name: Master of the Krampus Hunt
s11_holdfastquest_seasonelite_cramps.completionText:
Krampus Krazies Completed!
Lone Krampuses Eliminated!

objectives.description: Complete Krampus Krazies
Eliminate 100 Lone Krampus enemies
Survive for 30 Minutes in a single mission of Frostnite as a Ninja
Survive for 30 Minutes in a single mission of Frostnite as a Constructor
Survive for 30 Minutes in a single mission of Frostnite as an Outlander
Survive for 30 Minutes in a single mission of Frostnite as a Soldier
Deposit 15 BluGlo into the Furnace in a single Frostnite mission
Place 100 Structures in Frostnite
Break out BluGlo from Ice Blocks in Frostnite 7 times.
Eliminate all Lone Krampus targets in a single Frostnite Mission

scavengerquest_killhusks_9.name: Die, Husks, Die! - Stage 9
scavengerquest_killhusks_9.description: Put your Scavenger Weapons to good use. Team up with other Commanders and rid the world of storm creeps!

objectives.description: Eliminate 1500 Husks with a Scavenger Weapon in successful missions in a [UIRating]+ zone

scavengerquest_killhusks_10.name: Die, Husks, Die! - Stage 10
scavengerquest_killhusks_10.description: Put your Scavenger Weapons to good use. Team up with other Commanders and rid the world of storm creeps!

objectives.description: Eliminate 1500 Husks with a Scavenger Weapon in successful missions in a [UIRating]+ zone

scavengerquest_evolve_scavenger.name: Scavenger Weapon Evolution
scavengerquest_evolve_scavenger.description: Visit the Armory tab to evolve a Scavenger Weapon of your choice. Evolved Weapons are more powerful and may require rare crafting ingredients.

objectives.description: Evolve a Scavenger Weapon by 1 Star

scavengerquest_missionalert_soldier.name: Mission Alert! (Soldier)
scavengerquest_missionalert_soldier.description: Calling all Soldiers! Your combat skills are needed. Complete missions with the clock icon for additional rewards.

objectives.description: Complete 10 Mission Alerts as a Soldier

scavengerquest_levelup_collection_2.name: Another Commander's Treasure
scavengerquest_levelup_collection_2.description:
Commander, you may want to consider retiring more of your heroes, personnel, and schematics to your Collection Book. If you can level up your Collection Book to 50, you will receive additional scavenger rewards!

Remember, slotting people and schematics will remove them from action. However, once you complete a collection category, you will receive new rewards! Visit the Armory tab to level up your Collection Book.

objectives.description: Level Up Your Collection Book to 50

scavengerquest_killhusks_1.name: Die, Husks, Die! - Stage 1
scavengerquest_killhusks_1.description: Put your Scavenger Weapons to good use. Team up with other Commanders and rid the world of storm creeps!

objectives.description: Eliminate 500 Husks with a Scavenger Weapon in successful missions in a [UIRating]+ zone

scavengerquest_purchasellama.name: Scrounge Up
scavengerquest_purchasellama.description: Scrounge up and save! Earn your very own Scavenger Llama by successfully completing Expeditions and Limited Time Event Quests.

objectives.description: Purchase a Scavenger Llama from the Loot tab

scavengerquest_killhusks_2.name: Die, Husks, Die! - Stage 2
scavengerquest_killhusks_2.description: Put your Scavenger Weapons to good use. Team up with other Commanders and rid the world of storm creeps!

objectives.description: Eliminate 500 Husks with a Scavenger Weapon in successful missions in a [UIRating]+ zone

scavengerquest_missionalert_ninja.name: Mission Alert! (Ninja)
scavengerquest_missionalert_ninja.description: Calling all Ninjas! Your martial arts are needed. Complete missions with the clock icon for additional rewards.

objectives.description: Complete 10 Mission Alerts as a Ninja

scavengerquest_killhusks_4.name: Die, Husks, Die! - Stage 4
scavengerquest_killhusks_4.description: Put your Scavenger Weapons to good use. Team up with other Commanders and rid the world of storm creeps!

objectives.description: Eliminate 750 Husks with a Scavenger Weapon in successful missions in a [UIRating]+ zone

scavengerquest_missionalert_outlander.name: Mission Alert! (Outlander)
scavengerquest_missionalert_outlander.description: Calling all Outlanders! Your exploration skills are needed. Complete missions with the clock icon for additional rewards.

objectives.description: Complete 10 Mission Alerts as an Outlander

scavengerquest_killhusks_7.name: Die, Husks, Die! - Stage 7
scavengerquest_killhusks_7.description: Put your Scavenger Weapons to good use. Team up with other Commanders and rid the world of storm creeps!

objectives.description: Eliminate 1250 Husks with a Scavenger Weapon in successful missions in a [UIRating]+ zone

scavengerquest_levelup_collection_1.name: One Commander's Collection Is...
scavengerquest_levelup_collection_1.description:
Commander, you may want to consider retiring more of your heroes, personnel, and schematics to your Collection Book. If you can level up your Collection Book to 30, you will receive additional scavenger rewards!

Remember, slotting people and schematics will remove them from action. However, once you complete a collection category, you will receive new rewards! Visit the Armory tab to level up your Collection Book.

objectives.description: Level Up Your Collection Book to 30

scavengerquest_killhusks_5.name: Die, Husks, Die! - Stage 5
scavengerquest_killhusks_5.description: Put your Scavenger Weapons to good use. Team up with other Commanders and rid the world of storm creeps!

objectives.description: Eliminate 1000 Husks with a Scavenger Weapon in successful missions in a [UIRating]+ zone

scavengerquest_killhusks_8.name: Die, Husks, Die! - Stage 8
scavengerquest_killhusks_8.description: Put your Scavenger Weapons to good use. Team up with other Commanders and rid the world of storm creeps!

objectives.description: Eliminate 1250 Husks with a Scavenger Weapon in successful missions in a [UIRating]+ zone

scavengerquest_completeexpeditions.name: Leave No Stone Unturned
scavengerquest_completeexpeditions.description:
Well done, Commander! You can now send your Heroes on Expeditions. If an Expedition is successful, you receive rewards! Your Heroes will need People and Vehicles to accompany them. Expeditions take time to complete and are not guaranteed to succeed.

Visit the Command tab to assign your Heroes on an Expedition.
After an Expedition has been completed, go back to the Expeditions Squads tab and see if it was successful!

objectives.description: Successfully complete 5 Expeditions

scavengerquest_missionalert_constructor.name: Mission Alert! (Constructor)
scavengerquest_missionalert_constructor.description: Calling all Constructors! Your building skills are needed. Complete missions with the clock icon for additional rewards.

objectives.description: Complete 10 Mission Alerts as a Constructor

scavengerquest_levelup_scavenger.name: Scavenger Weapon Enhancement
scavengerquest_levelup_scavenger.description: Visit the Armory tab to level up a Scavenger Weapon of your choice.

objectives.description: Level Up a Scavenger Weapon

scavengerquest_killhusks_6.name: Die, Husks, Die! - Stage 6
scavengerquest_killhusks_6.description: Put your Scavenger Weapons to good use. Team up with other Commanders and rid the world of storm creeps!

objectives.description: Eliminate 1000 Husks with a Scavenger Weapon in successful missions in a [UIRating]+ zone

scavengerquest_completestormzones.name: Perpetual Storms
scavengerquest_completestormzones.description: These storms are relentless and spreading! Look for purple turbulance on the map! Complete some missions in those hexes.

objectives.description: Complete 2 Mutant Storm missions

objectives.description: Complete the Crypts Dungeon.

Complete the Labyrinth Dungeon.

objectives.description: Get hit by an Arrow Dungeon Trap.
Get snared by a Snare Dungeon Trap.
Get hit by a Ceiling Drop Dungeon Trap.
Get teleported by a Teleport Dungeon Trap.

Note: This is a repeatable quest.

The reason is the new Lab dungeon is shipping after this season has started, so we need a way to grant the first Lab quest if players have already completed the first Crypts dungeon quest. In subsequent Dungeon seasons, this quest will no longer be necessary since the Crypts quest will grant the first Lab quest as a quest reward.

lovequest_2018_reactive_teddybears.name: Bear Force One
lovequest_2018_reactive_teddybears.description: The Teddy Bear Balloons are filled with chocolate and ready to launch! Spread the love (or at least the calories) to the survivors out in the world.

objectives.description: Launch Teddy Bear Balloons

springquest_2018_reactive_gymstuff.name: Two More!
springquest_2018_reactive_gymstuff.description: Collect gym equipment for Val. Found in urban and suburban zones.
springquest_2018_reactive_gymstuff.completionText: Dedicated to the memory of SWOLE-bot.

objectives.description: Gather 5 pieces of training equipment

lovequest_2018_reactive_mailboxes.name: Love's Letters Lost
lovequest_2018_reactive_mailboxes.description: Search red mailboxes for notes from Summer.

objectives.description: Search 5 Mailboxes in successful missions

springquest_2018_reactive_vhs.name: Inspirational Films
springquest_2018_reactive_vhs.description: Find the perfect film to help Val power through her training.

objectives.description: Gather 8 VHS tapes

springquest_2018_reactive_cctv_cameras.name: Creature Features
springquest_2018_reactive_cctv_cameras.description: Rumors of the Dreaded Clusterhusk might just be true. Search for footage of the rampaging trio of deadly husks.
springquest_2018_reactive_cctv_cameras.completionText: Uh oh. We'd better get ready to fight.

objectives.description: Access 6 CCTV cameras

springquest_2018_reactive_tents.name: Band on the Run
springquest_2018_reactive_tents.description: Help Val find the rest of her team.

objectives.description: Search 5 tents for Val's team

springquest_2018_evolvedragonweapon.name: Dragon Weapon Evolution
springquest_2018_evolvedragonweapon.description: Visit the Armory tab to evolve a Dragon Weapon of your choice.

objectives.description: Evolve a Dragon Weapon by 1 Star

springquest_2018_killhusksmelee.name: Stab n' Slash 101
springquest_2018_killhusksmelee.description: Break out a melee weapon and show Val how it's done.

objectives.description: Eliminate 50 husks with a melee weapon in successful missions

springquest_2018_reactive_huntminiboss_f.name: The Dreaded Clusterhusk
springquest_2018_reactive_huntminiboss_f.description: A deadly cluster of dangerous husks is on the loose! Team up and take out all three.

objectives.description: Eliminate the dreaded clusterhusk!

springquest_2018_reactive_fireworks_repe.name: Things That Go Bang In The Night
springquest_2018_reactive_fireworks_repe.description: Stay lucky! Launch fireworks and collect those envelopes. Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

objectives.description: Deploy small fireworks and gather red envelopes

springquest_2018_reactive_locationdiscov.name: You Don't Have To Go Home...
springquest_2018_reactive_locationdiscov.description: Search for a pub to learn the Leprechaun's true name. Pubs are most often found in downtown city areas.

objectives.description: Visit one pub

springquest_2018_reactive_lanterns.name: 'Nitelites
springquest_2018_reactive_lanterns.description: Place red lanterns for fortune and luck.
springquest_2018_reactive_lanterns.completionText: I love what you've done with the place.

objectives.description: Place 8 lanterns

lovequest_2018_reactive_song.name: In Your Ears
lovequest_2018_reactive_song.description: Help Dennis and Summer reunite with the perfect couple song.
lovequest_2018_reactive_song.completionText: The song will not be good. But we helped!

objectives.description: Listen to 5 boomboxes

springquest_2018_reactive_killcollect_cl.name: Leaves of Four
springquest_2018_reactive_killcollect_cl.description: Do the husks seem luckier than usual? Take 'em out and look for clues.
springquest_2018_reactive_killcollect_cl.completionText: Keep your husky hands off our clovers!

objectives.description: Eliminate & Collect: 50 lucky clovers

springquest_2018_starterhidden.name: (Temp) Hidden Quest
springquest_2018_starterhidden.completionText: (Temp) Hidden Quest to enable activities in the second part of the event

springquest_2018_reactive_quotes.name: Let's Commence
springquest_2018_reactive_quotes.description: Prepare a speech for Val's graduation.

objectives.description: Search 5 book stacks

springquest_2018_reactive_fireworks.name: Luck Explosion
springquest_2018_reactive_fireworks.description: Stock up on luck by launching fireworks and collecting red envelopes.
springquest_2018_reactive_fireworks.completionText: 'Splode in the year of the dog

objectives.description: Deploy small fireworks

springquest_2018_reactive_rescueval.name: The Blu Badge Of Courage
springquest_2018_reactive_rescueval.description: Find and defend a stranded survivor.

objectives.description: Find & Defend Val
Find 5 Green Garden Gnomes

springquest_2018_build_trojan_bunny.name: Trojan Bunny
springquest_2018_build_trojan_bunny.description: Whenever we celebrate, the storm attacks. It's time to turn the tables with some hoppin' adorable mayhem!

objectives.description: Build a Trojan Bunny

springquest_2018_complete_bumpeddifficul.name: Double Trouble
springquest_2018_complete_bumpeddifficul.description: When you locate the primary objective, look for a difficulty pylon nearby. Interact with the pylon and add BluGlo to increase the difficulty. You can increase the difficulty more than once, but it is not required.

objectives.description: Complete 2 Enhanced Difficulty Missions
Find & Defend Summer

springquest_2018_complete_fireworkcluste.name: The Big Wick
springquest_2018_complete_fireworkcluste.description: Protect and launch a Mega-Llamacracker to light up the night sky with style.

objectives.description: Launch 2 Firework Clusters Secondaries

springquest_2018_reactive_fountains.name: Change of Luck
springquest_2018_reactive_fountains.description: We need all the luck we can get. The coins thrown into the fountains should have some residual luck in them. Smash the fountains and collect those lucky coins. Most often found in urban and suburban zones.

objectives.description: Destroy fountains to collect lucky coins.

springquest_2018_killhusksdragonweapon.name: Bye Bye!
springquest_2018_killhusksdragonweapon.description: Put your Dragon Weapons to good use. Team up with other Commanders and rid the world of these creeps!

objectives.description: Eliminate 886 Husks with a Dragon Weapon in successful missions

lovequest_2018_reactive_chocolates.name: If You Can't Find Love...
lovequest_2018_reactive_chocolates.description: There's always chocolate. Search the world for romantic chocolates. Most often found in home kitchens and grocery stores in urban and suburban zones.
lovequest_2018_reactive_chocolates.completionText: Who needs love with all this candy?

objectives.description: Find Chocolates

springquest_2018_reactive_clothing.name: Dressed To Kill
springquest_2018_reactive_clothing.description: Collect tactical clothing for Val. Destroy clothing racks and closets found in urban and suburban zones.
springquest_2018_reactive_clothing.completionText: Tactical is very big this season.

objectives.description: Gather tactical clothing

lovequest_2018_reactive_rescuedennis.name: Dennis to Society
lovequest_2018_reactive_rescuedennis.description: Rescue Dennis from the storm, and himself.

objectives.description: Find & Defend: Dennis

springquest_2018_reactive_egghunt.name: Dial M For Eggs
springquest_2018_reactive_egghunt.description: Help Ray take on her most challenging case yet.

objectives.description: Find 9 Easter Eggs

springquest_2018_killmistmonstersdragonw.name: Mistfortune
springquest_2018_killmistmonstersdragonw.description: Unleash the dragon and defeat 38 mist monsters with your favorite Dragon Weapon.

objectives.description: Eliminate 38 Mist Monsters with a Dragon Weapon in successful missions

springquest_2018_reactive_leprechaun_tra.name: Nobody Takes Me Flakes!
springquest_2018_reactive_leprechaun_tra.description: To trap a leprechaun, you're going to need some tasty treats. Bait traps with leprechaun endorsed snacks.

objectives.description: Deploy 5 Leprechaun Traps

springquest_2018_reactive_potsofgold.name: Fool's Gold
springquest_2018_reactive_potsofgold.description: Commander, there's free gold EVERYWHERE! Oh, and on an unrelated note, we have reports there's a new storm hazard luring people into dangerous situations. So get out there and don't come back until we're rich!
springquest_2018_reactive_potsofgold.completionText:
The Storm Gold has been banished! Nice work!

You take care of those lucky husks, and I'll work on a way to take care of our leprechaun problem.

objectives.description: Search the zone for Storm Gold

s11_reactivefetch_quest_a2.name: Day 2
s11_reactivefetch_quest_a2.description: Investigate clues to learn more about the hauntings in the hotel. Must be completed during a Survive the Night mission.

objectives.description: Investigate clues in the hotel

s11_gathercollect_quest_b6.name: Wolf Me, Wolf Me Not
s11_gathercollect_quest_b6.description: Gather the wolfsbane plant leaves to deter the wolfpack. Hint: Best found in swamps. Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Destroy and collect wolfsbane plant leaves

s11_fetch_quest_b4.name: Neighborhood Night Watch
s11_fetch_quest_b4.description: Interview sleeping vampires resting in their coffins to learn more about werewolves in Hexsylvania. Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Give flasks to sleeping vampires in coffins

s11_fetch_quest_b1.name: Where Wolf?
s11_fetch_quest_b1.description: Mysterious trees in Hexsylvania need to be investigated. Could they be signs of a Werewolf? Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Search for clawed trees in Hexsylvania

s11_fetch_quest_b2.name: Blood Moon Rising
s11_fetch_quest_b2.description: Set up telescopes to observe and determine the exact moment of the Super Blood moon. Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Deploy telescopes in Hexsylvania

s11_fetch_quest_b7.name: Get Packing
s11_fetch_quest_b7.description: Deploy wolfsbane amulets in Hexsylvania and restore peace to the land... for now. Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Deploy wolfsbane amulets

s11_gathercollect_quest_b3.name: Wakey Wakey
s11_gathercollect_quest_b3.description: Maybe vampires can help us solve our were-problems. Gather flasks from cabinets in Hexsylvania. Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Destroy cabinets to collect flasks

s11_fetch_quest_b5.name: The Dire
s11_fetch_quest_b5.description: Help Dire through the Packstravaganza and get more info on the wolfpack's plans. Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Deploy receivers in Hexsylvania

s11_destroy_quest_d4.name: What Mobs Do
s11_destroy_quest_d4.description: The villagers are agitated by Arrlene and may be assembling a mob. Destroy their boats to slow them down. Hint: Best found in Hexsylvanian swamps. Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Destroy boats in Hexsylvania

s11_gathercollect_quest_d5.name: Save The Date
s11_gathercollect_quest_d5.description: Water plants are a vital component to summon monsters. Harvest water plants in the swamps for the Summoning Soup. Hint: Best found in Hexsylvanian swamps. Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Destroy water plants to collect its flower

s11_killcollect_quest_d6.name: PitchTorch
s11_killcollect_quest_d6.description: Save Arrlene from the husk mob. Take their torches away from them. Must be completed in Hexsylvania. Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Eliminate torch-thrower pitchers and gather their torches

s11_fetch_quest_d3.name: Dear Di-arrrr-y
s11_fetch_quest_d3.description: Find and read the diary entries to learn more about Arrlene. Must be completed in Hexsylvania. Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Find Arrlene's diary entries

s11_gathercollect_quest_d1.name: Find Your Backbone
s11_gathercollect_quest_d1.description: Penny needs bags of... things. Gather bags from lab furniture because she pretty much needs it all. Needs to be completed in Hexsylvania.  Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Destroy lab furniture to collect bags of things

s11_fetch_quest_d7.name: Dearly Departed
s11_fetch_quest_d7.description: Construct a luxury honeymoon RV wagon by salvaging old wagons in Hexsylvania. Hint: Best found in swamps. Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Gather caravan wagons in Hexsylvania

s11_fetch_quest_d2.name: Are We Calling it a Monster?
s11_fetch_quest_d2.description: Lightning rods are needed for the next step of Penny's plan. Deploy lightning rods in the area. Needs to be completed in Hexsylvania.  Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Deploy lightning rods in Hexsylvania

s11_fetch_quest_c5.name: Dry Docked
s11_fetch_quest_c5.description: Gather paddles for slashers only canoe race. Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Find paddles for canoes

s11_gathercollect_quest_c3.name: What's a landline?
s11_gathercollect_quest_c3.description: A big camp fire is a great place for spooky stories. Destroy campfires to gather marshmallow sticks. Best completed in Shady Acres.

objectives.description: Destroy campfires to gather marshmallow sticks

s11_fetch_quest_c4.name: Lurk Free Zone
s11_fetch_quest_c4.description: Gather backpacks and prepare for the No Lurking Challenge. Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Find backpacks for hiking

s11_destroy_quest_c1.name: Axes Of Evil
s11_destroy_quest_c1.description: Help survive the week at camp by destroying Slasher axes. Must be completed in Shady Acres.

objectives.description: Destroy slasher's axes in Shady Acres

s11_reactivekill_quest_c7.name: OW. YOUR EYE.
s11_reactivekill_quest_c7.description: Join forces with the slashers by showing you can think like them. Use bladed weapons to eliminate enemies Hint: Use swords, scythes, or axes. Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Eliminate enemies using blade weapons

s11_fetch_quest_c2.name: Notes From On The Ground
s11_fetch_quest_c2.description: Raven is ready to help translate old journal clippings from Slashers you can find in the wilderness. Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Find journal clippings from Slashers

s11_fetch_quest_c6.name: Bury the Hatchet
s11_fetch_quest_c6.description: Grab some targets for hatchet throwing practice and attempt to make peace with the Slashers. Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Find targets for practice

s11_destroy_quest_e6.name: Night 6: Nice Ghost
s11_destroy_quest_e6.description: Willow insists that the evil gnomes throughout the hotel be destroyed for everyone's safety. Must be completed during a Survive the Night mission.

objectives.description: Destroy evil gnomes in the hotel

s11_landmark_quest_e8.name: The Door To Darkness
s11_landmark_quest_e8.description: Discover the underground crypt and deploy the ghost vacuum to stop the true threat in the hotel - the door to darkness!

objectives.description: Deploy and defend the ghost vacuum

s11_fetch_quest_e7.name: Day 7: Dear Ghost Diary
s11_fetch_quest_e7.description: Gather pages in the hotel which were torn from Willow's diary and discover how to help. Must be completed during a Survive the Night mission.

objectives.description: Collect Willow's diary entries

s11_fetch_quest_e5.name: Night 5: Debnis
s11_fetch_quest_e5.description: It is time to communicate with the "ghost." Set up spirit boards to talk with Lok's imaginary friend. Must be completed during a Survive the Night mission.

objectives.description: Deploy spirit boards throughout the hotel

s11_landmark_quest_e1.name: Night 1: Rumors of Ghost Activity
s11_landmark_quest_e1.description: Explore the haunted hotel and deploy sensors to measure the supernatural field.

objectives.description: Investigate the haunted hotel

s11_gathercollect_quest_e4.name: Night 4: Hissing Contest
s11_gathercollect_quest_e4.description: The ghosts haunting the hotel are restless. Investigating where they took their final rest will lead to answers. Gather ghost ectoplasm samples from hotel beds. Must be completed during a Survive the Night mission.

objectives.description: Gather ghost ectoplasm samples from hotel beds

s11_fetch_quest_e2.name: Night 2: Ghost Boss
s11_fetch_quest_e2.description: Investigate clues to learn more about the hauntings in the hotel. Must be completed during a Survive the Night mission.

objectives.description: Investigate clues in the hotel

s11_destroy_quest_e3.name: Night 3: Leave This Place
s11_destroy_quest_e3.description: Legends about the hotel indicate that scary statues in the garden labyrinth may be the source of the hauntings. Investigate... or interrogate the statues. Must be completed during a Survive the Night mission.

objectives.description: Destroy scary statues in the garden labyrinth

vindertechquest_killquickenedpitchers.name: Shut Up and Pitch
vindertechquest_killquickenedpitchers.description: Commander, watch out! These Pitcher Husks are mutated by the storm. Eliminate as many of them as you can!

objectives.description: Eliminate 50 Quickened Pitcher Husks in successful Mutant Storm missions

vindertechquest_explorezones_7.name: Reconnaissance - Stage 7
vindertechquest_explorezones_7.description: Explore the world while completing missions.

objectives.description: Fully explore 6 zones in successful missions in a [UIRating]+ zone

vindertechquest_safes_8.name: Unsafe Deposit - Stage 8
vindertechquest_safes_8.description: Find and loot as many safes as you can. Quest progress is shared with the group.

vindertechquest_killenragedhuskyhusks.name: Don't Make Them Angry
vindertechquest_killenragedhuskyhusks.description: Commander, watch out! These Husky Husks are mutated by the storm. Eliminate as many of them as you can!

objectives.description: Eliminate 50 Enraged Husky Husks in successful Mutant Storm missions

vindertechquest_evolve_vindertech.name: Vindertech Weapon Evolution
vindertechquest_evolve_vindertech.description: Visit the Armory tab to evolve a Vindertech Weapon of your choice. Evolved Weapons are more powerful and may require rare crafting ingredients.

objectives.description: Evolve a Vindertech Weapon by 1 Star
