stormking_daily_landmark_bossfight.name: Kingslayer
stormking_daily_landmark_bossfight.description: Defeat the Storm King! Are you up for this Daily Challenge?

objectives.description: Defeat the Storm King

s9_killcollect_quest_a5.name: Major Spoilers
s9_killcollect_quest_a5.description: Husklings have raided the Homebase gold supply. Take 'em out and return the missing rings.

objectives.description: Take out husklings and collect golden rings

s9_fetch_quest_a1.name: Lok Out
s9_fetch_quest_a1.description: Lok has gone missing. Use his flier cannons to distribute missing posters.

objectives.description: Activate the flier cannons
(Hidden) Watch S9 Video

s9_fetch_quest_b1.name: And I am Her Cap'n
s9_fetch_quest_b1.description: Cap'n Azalea Clark has been spotted at Homebase. It's time to binge watch Beyond The Stellar Horizon.

objectives.description: Collect episodes of Beyond The Stellar Horizon
Re-shoot key scenes with CG-Bot

s9_fetch_quest_b15.name: Splash Down
s9_fetch_quest_b15.description: ED-EE is coming home. Deploy pillows to give him a safe landing.

objectives.description: Deploy emergency landing pillows

s9_gathercollect_quest_b5.name: ED-EE
s9_gathercollect_quest_b5.description: Help Azalea find everything she needs to rebuild ED-EE.

objectives.description: Collect ED-EE parts in Industrial zones

s9_fetch_quest_b10.name: Troll-bles
s9_fetch_quest_b10.description: Every film production has a troll problem or two. Deploy anti-troll vacuums and take back what's ours.

objectives.description: Deploy troll vacuums over dormant troll dens

s9_gathercollect_quest_a4.name: We'll Have the Quinoa
s9_gathercollect_quest_a4.description: Help Dennis prepare for open-bot surgery by collecting parts for a post surgery incubation oven.

objectives.description: Destroy ovens to collect heating elements in Suburban zones

s9_fetch_quest_b14.name: Red Carpet
s9_fetch_quest_b14.description: We may need to provide some escape routes from the premiere. Collect red carpets.

objectives.description: Gather red carpets

s9_fetch_quest_a3.name: Is This Your Monster?
s9_fetch_quest_a3.description: Search the zone to find Lok's monster.

objectives.description: Search the zone for gargoyles

s9_gathercollect_quest_b8.name: Table Read
s9_gathercollect_quest_b8.description: Time to see what our writers have come up with. It's probably fine.

objectives.description: Gather table parts

s9_destroy_quest_a6.name: The Major, the Lok, and the Wardrobes
s9_destroy_quest_a6.description: Help Lok overcome his fears by destroying potential monster hiding places.

objectives.description: Destroy closets that may harbor monsters in Suburban and Urban zones

s9_killcollect_quest_b4.name: Headshots
s9_killcollect_quest_b4.description: The casting office has been raided by husks. Get those headshots back!

objectives.description: Take out the husks and collect the missing headshots

s9_fetch_quest_a7.name: Dennosaur
s9_fetch_quest_a7.description: Dennis has a plan, and it involves dinosaurs - You know what to do.

objectives.description: Collect dinosaur toys in Suburban, Urban, and Industrial zones

s9_fetch_quest_b11.name: ADR
s9_fetch_quest_b11.description: ED-EE is in space and we have no time to recast. Deploy antennas to record his dialogue from orbit.

objectives.description: Deploy communication antennas

s9_fetch_quest_b9.description: Okay, the script is not great. We're gonna need some very special effects. Collect rocket parts.

objectives.description: Search the zone for rocket parts in Industrial zones

s9_landmark_quest_b2.name: Backstage
s9_landmark_quest_b2.description: The Beyond the Stellar Horizon soundstage has been found. Explore the set!

objectives.description: Search the Beyond the Stellar Horizon soundstage

s9_fetch_quest_a14.name: Ding!
s9_fetch_quest_a14.description: Well... Lok was right. We'd better find a way to learn more about his monster encounter.

objectives.description: Search the zone for printer paper in Suburban, Urban, and Industrial zones

s9_fetch_quest_a13.name: Monster Hunters
s9_fetch_quest_a13.description: We've found the area from Lok's broadcast. The monster should be nearby.

objectives.description: Search the zone for signs of Lok's monster

s9_gathercollect_quest_a15.name: To Be Continued
s9_gathercollect_quest_a15.description: Is this monster encounter a stand alone feature? A trilogy? A prequel? Dennis will decide...

objectives.description: Collect video editing software in Urban zones

s9_fetch_quest_b3.name: Vision
s9_fetch_quest_b3.description: Pre-production is a go! Find cameras and prepare for filming.

objectives.description: Search the zone for cameras

s9_gathercollect_quest_a12.name: Crash Course
s9_gathercollect_quest_a12.description: Find books to pinpoint the location of Lok's television projection.

objectives.description: Destroy bookcases to collect books in Suburban and Urban zones

s9_fetch_quest_b13.name: The Produce-ers
s9_fetch_quest_b13.description: The movie is a disaster! Collect mushy tomatoes before they can be thrown in our faces!

objectives.description: Collect mushy tomatoes

s9_killcollect_quest_a10.name: Din. Er
s9_killcollect_quest_a10.description: The beast must feed! Help Din.0 feast on mist monster samples.

objectives.description: Gather mist monster samples

s9_fetch_quest_b7.name: Park Bench Scene
s9_fetch_quest_b7.description: Script pages are coming in! Track down the best scenes you can find.

objectives.description: Collect script pages

s9_fetch_quest_b6.name: Bat to Business
s9_fetch_quest_b6.description: Lure Ken back into the acting game by tracking down his iconic catchphrase.

objectives.description: Search the zone for Ken's iconic catchphrase

s9_gather_quest_a8.name: It Goes Where It Goes
s9_gather_quest_a8.description: Help Dennis test out his latest invention.

objectives.description: Collect teddy bears in Suburban zones

s9_fetch_quest_a9.name: Self Care
s9_fetch_quest_a9.description: Luna's in charge, and that means it's time to relax and play games. Collect arcade games to get the party started.

objectives.description: Collect arcade games in Suburban, Urban, and Industrial zones

s9_fetch_quest_a11.name: TV Party
s9_fetch_quest_a11.description: Help Jess take the easy way out.

objectives.description: Collect televisions for Lok in Suburban and Urban zones

s9_fetch_quest_a2.name: Post Mortem
s9_fetch_quest_a2.description: Find out who's responsible for Lok's lock out by reviewing security footage.

objectives.description: Collect security footage in Suburban and Urban zones

betastormquest_completebetastorms_repeat.name: Beta Storm Prospecting
betastormquest_completebetastorms_repeat.description: We're seeing some strange weather patterns in the area. Complete some Beta Storm missions, for Science (and Gold)!

objectives.description: Complete 2 Beta Storm missions

piratequest_2019_fetch_treasure.name: No One Leaves!
piratequest_2019_fetch_treasure.description: This is it! Search the zone to find Rowdy Jack's treasure.

objectives.description: Find the Treasure. You might find it in any zone

piratequest_2019_fetch_shanties.name: You Shant
piratequest_2019_fetch_shanties.description: Help Blakebeard and Keelhaul rekindle their sea spirit by finding the perfect shanty.

objectives.description: Search for Sea Shanties

piratequest_2019_killcollect_mistmonster.name: Ship Wrecked
piratequest_2019_killcollect_mistmonster.description: Don't let the mist monsters make off with Blakebeard and Keelhaul's pirate ship!

objectives.description: Find Ship Parts by eliminating mist monsters in any zone.
(Hidden) Watch Spring 2019 Pirate Video

piratequest_2019_fetch_bottles.name: Bottled Memoranda
piratequest_2019_fetch_bottles.description: Check in on Blakebeard and Keelhaul's adventures on the high seas by collecting bottled messages.

objectives.description: Collect Messages from bottles

piratequest_2019_fetch_mounds.name: Another Man's Treasure
piratequest_2019_fetch_mounds.description: Dig up everything Blakebeard and Keelhaul have stolen from Homebase.

objectives.description: Find Caches in any zone

piratequest_2019_fetch_statues.name: Stone Faced
piratequest_2019_fetch_statues.description: The treasure hunt is on! Search ancient Plankenesian stone heads for clues.

objectives.description: Search Ancient Plankenesian Stone Heads for clues

piratequest_2019_fetch_lighthouses.name: Light the Way
piratequest_2019_fetch_lighthouses.description: Light stone beacons to continue the search for Rowdy Jack's treasure.

objectives.description: Light the Stone Beacons

piratequest_2019_killcollect_melee.name: Abordage
piratequest_2019_killcollect_melee.description: Grab a melee weapon and prepare to demonstrate your swashbuckling, husk busting skills.

objectives.description: Collect Melee Trophies from husks

piratequest_2019_fetch_seebots.name: SEE-Wolf
piratequest_2019_fetch_seebots.description: A black flag flies on the horizon, are pirates headed for Homebase? Stand by to deploy our state of the art pirate detection system.

objectives.description: Deploy PIRA-SEE-Bots in any zone

piratequest_2019_fetch_banners.name: Under the Black Flag
piratequest_2019_fetch_banners.description: Teach our pirate recruits the secrets of piratical intimidation by planting pirate flags.

objectives.description: Deploy Pirate Flags in any zone

piratequest_2019_landmark_walktheplank.name: Walk the Plank
piratequest_2019_landmark_walktheplank.description: Our pirates are ready to take to the seas once more. Help Blakebeard and Keelhaul build the pirate ship of their dreams.

objectives.description: Build the Pirate Ship

piratequest_2019_gathercollect_chairs.name: One Step
piratequest_2019_gathercollect_chairs.description: Blakebeard and Keelhaul may not need peg legs yet, but it never hurts to be prepared. Destroy wooden chairs to harvest peg legs.

objectives.description: Collect Peg Legs from most wooden chairs.

piratequest_2019_gathercollect_grillpart.name: A Celebration of the Sea
piratequest_2019_gathercollect_grillpart.description: Fate has called upon Dennis to craft the ultimate Pirate Burger, but is he ready for the challenge?

objectives.description: Collect Grill Parts for Dennis. Found mostly in Suburban and Lakeside zones.

piratequest_2019_landmark_island.name: Yarrr!
piratequest_2019_landmark_island.description: The pirates have crashed! Let's disarm their ship before they have a chance to attack.

objectives.description: Neutralize the Pirate Threat

piratequest_2019_gathercollect_swings.name: Climb Aboard!
piratequest_2019_gathercollect_swings.description: Help Director Riggs build a sea sickness cure for Blakebeard and Keelhaul. HINT: Springs and Swing Parts can be found in Suburban zones.

objectives.description: Gather springs and swing parts to construct a sea-sickness simulator.

lovequest_2019_gathercollect_mushrooms.name: Papers
lovequest_2019_gathercollect_mushrooms.description: Sarah and Jonesy have returned from Hexslyvania with the Hate Potion recipe. Collect hate mushrooms and get ready to brew!

objectives.description: Collect Hate Mushrooms in Forest zones

lovequest_2019_gathercollect_officestuff.name: The Book of Love
lovequest_2019_gathercollect_officestuff.description: Director Riggs needs a love policy stat! Search office spaces for any love related HR guidelines.

objectives.description: Collect Old HR Guidelines from Office File Cabinets and Cubicles in Urban, Suburban, Industrial zones

lovequest_2019_fetch_boxes.name: Oh!
lovequest_2019_fetch_boxes.description: Kyle and Eagle Eye are in love... but they have nothing in common. Search for something, anything they can agree on.

objectives.description: Search for Stuff

lovequest_2019_gathercollect_containers.name: Trapped by Love
lovequest_2019_gathercollect_containers.description: Penny has a new plan for dealing with the husk horde. Collect container walls...

objectives.description: Collect Container Walls in Industrial zones

lovequest_2019_fetch_telescopes.name: Little Star
lovequest_2019_fetch_telescopes.description: A love fog is settling over Homebase. Help Sarah look to the stars to find her love horoscope.

objectives.description: Deploy Telescopes
(Hidden) Watch Spring 2019 Love Storm Video

lovequest_2019_fetch_decanters.name: I Remember Me
lovequest_2019_fetch_decanters.description: It's time to put an end to the love storm. Distribute Hate Potion to the love scrambled heroes of Homebase.

objectives.description: Distribute Hate Potions

lovequest_2019_fetch_teddys.name: Happy Together
lovequest_2019_fetch_teddys.description: Last year's teddy bear balloons are causing problems for the local wildlife, track 'em down and bring 'em home.

objectives.description: Collect Deflated Teddy Bear Balloons

lovequest_2019_gathercollect_newspapers.name: Pictures of You
lovequest_2019_gathercollect_newspapers.description: The Cloaked Star refuses the call of romance. Help him come to terms with the past in a newspaper box smashing trip down memory lane.

objectives.description: Collect Old Newspapers in Urban and Suburban zones

lovequest_2019_landmark_trebuchet.name: You Send Me
lovequest_2019_landmark_trebuchet.description: Prepare to send an expedition to Hexsylvania, trebuchet style.

objectives.description: Prepare the Trebuchet

lovequest_2019_fetch_phones.name: Love Wars
lovequest_2019_fetch_phones.description: Find out who is behind the terrible new advice call in show, Dennis The Love King.

objectives.description: Find Working Payphones in Urban and Suburban zones

lovequest_2019_gathercollect_mailboxes.name: Uh Oh, Love Comes to Town
lovequest_2019_gathercollect_mailboxes.description: Everyone's in love - in a bad way. Search love letters for clues.

objectives.description: Collect Love Letters from Mailboxes

lovequest_2019_fetch_chests.name: Maps
lovequest_2019_fetch_chests.description: The antidote to love lies in Hexsylvania... how do we get there again?

objectives.description: Search Hexsylvanian Travel Chests

lovequest_2019_fetch_sensors.name: Satellite of Love
lovequest_2019_fetch_sensors.description: The forecast calls for crushing infatuation! Help Lars track the love storm.

objectives.description: Deploy Sensors for Lars

lovequest_2019_fetch_vhs.name: I Think I Need a New Heart
lovequest_2019_fetch_vhs.description: Ray just isn't feeling the love. Find some romantic comedies to set the mood for romance.

objectives.description: Find Romantic Comedies

lovequest_2019_killcollect_lovelobbers.name: All My Friends
lovequest_2019_killcollect_lovelobbers.description: We found the cure, but the love lobbers are still lobbing. Take 'em out, collect their Love Poison, and tell 'em how you feel.

objectives.description: Collect Love Poison Bottles from Love Lobbers

winterquest_2017_reactive_fetch_deploytr.name: The Festival of Nites
winterquest_2017_reactive_fetch_deploytr.description: Let's guide the survivors back to Homebase with festive trees. (not available in Survive the Storm)
winterquest_2017_reactive_fetch_deploytr.completionText: The winter weapon is ready for action!

objectives.description: Place 11 Christmas trees

winterquest_2017_completesurvive7day_d2.name: Cold as Ice
winterquest_2017_completesurvive7day_d2.description:
Survive a 7 Day mission in a Power 40 zone.

You can access Survive the Storm by selecting the Map tab and then selecting the Survive the Storm pin.
winterquest_2017_completesurvive7day_d2.completionText: Mission completed! Time to thaw out!

objectives.description: Complete a 7 Day Survive the Storm in a [UIRating] zone
Eliminate 750 Li'l Evil Helpers in successful missions

winterquest_2017_reactive_fetch_radios.name: No Joy
winterquest_2017_reactive_fetch_radios.description: Listen to Radio Free Plankerton's call in show.  (not available in Survive the Storm)

objectives.description: Listen to 8 radio broadcasts
(Hidden) Complete Maul Santas Quest
(Hidden) Complete You're a Mean One Quest
(Hidden) Complete Kill Coal Lobbers Quest
(Hidden) Watch Holiday Survival Video

winterquest_2017_reactive_fetch_decorati.name: Fa La La La La, La La La Ornaments
winterquest_2017_reactive_fetch_decorati.description: Time to spread cheer... or die trying. Let's collect holiday ornaments to bring back to Homebase. (not available in Survive the Storm)

objectives.description: Find 7 boxes of holiday ornaments

winterquest_2017_completesurviveany.name: Hopeful Survival
winterquest_2017_completesurviveany.description:
Successfully complete Survive the Storm missions in any threat level.

You can access Survive the Storm by selecting the Map tab and then selecting the Survive the Storm pin.
winterquest_2017_completesurviveany.completionText: You live to fight another day!

objectives.description: Complete 3 Survive the Storm missions
Eliminate 10 Epic Mini-Bosses in successful Mini-Boss missions
hidden quest to track progress

winterquest_2017_killminibosses_repeatab.name: Like a "Mini-Boss"
winterquest_2017_killminibosses_repeatab.description: Eliminate as many Epic Mini-Bosses as you can, Commander! (also available in Survive the Storm). Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate an Epic Mini-Boss in a successful Mini-Boss mission

winterquest_2017_reactive_gather_trees.name: The Perfect Tree
winterquest_2017_reactive_gather_trees.description: Search the zone for happy little trees.  (not available in Survive the Storm)

objectives.description: Harvest small pine trees and collect 20 pristine trees
Eliminate 30 Mall Santas in successful missions

winterquest_2017_reactive_fetch_collectp.name: Secret Santa
winterquest_2017_reactive_fetch_collectp.description: One final present, this time it's for you, commander. (not available in Survive the Storm)

objectives.description: Find the present

winterquest_2017_reactive_gather_fridges.name: Cold Miser
winterquest_2017_reactive_gather_fridges.description: It might be cold out there this time of year, but we're gonna need some serious freeze juice for our new weapon, try searching in cities. (not available in Survive the Storm)
winterquest_2017_reactive_gather_fridges.completionText: We're closing in on that winter weapon!

objectives.description: Harvest refrigerators and collect 12 freezer units

winterquest_2017_killcoallobbers.name: You'd Better Watch Out!
winterquest_2017_killcoallobbers.description: No one brings coal to our party! Take out those lobbers!

objectives.description: Eliminate 50 Coal Lobbers in successful missions
Eliminate 50 Mist Monsters with a Vacuum Tube Weapon in successful missions

winterquest_2017_complete_presentdrop_re.name: Present Drop
winterquest_2017_complete_presentdrop_re.description: Lars' van is on the move! Be on the lookout for Present Drops and see what you receive! (not available in Ride the Lightning mission). Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

objectives.description: Complete a Present Drop in a successful mission

winterquest_2017_reactive_fetch_packingp.name: Jingle all the Way!
winterquest_2017_reactive_fetch_packingp.description: Track down the perfect gifts for your Homebase family. (not available in Survive the Storm)

objectives.description: Find 12 holiday gifts

winterquest_2017_completesurvive7day_d3.name: Deep Freeze
winterquest_2017_completesurvive7day_d3.description:
A 7 Day mission in a Power 70 zone? Can you survive the deep freeze?

You can access Survive the Storm by selecting the Map tab and then selecting the Survive the Storm pin.
winterquest_2017_completesurvive7day_d3.completionText: You have survived the deep freeze!

objectives.description: Complete a 7 Day Survive the Storm in a [UIRating] zone

winterquest_2017_completesurvive7day_d1.name: Winter's Chill
winterquest_2017_completesurvive7day_d1.description:
Survive the Storm for 7 days in a Power 15 zone.

You can access Survive the Storm by selecting the Map tab and then selecting the Survive the Storm pin.
winterquest_2017_completesurvive7day_d1.completionText: You have survived the chill of winter!

objectives.description: Complete a 7 Day Survive the Storm in a [UIRating] zone

winterquest_2017_larslandmarkmission.name: Welcome to the Party, Pal!
winterquest_2017_larslandmarkmission.description: Find Ray's present stash, and make with the merriment!

objectives.description: Complete the Spread the Joy mission

winterquest_2017_reactive_gather_books.name: The Fairytale of Homebase
winterquest_2017_reactive_gather_books.description: Find the perfect story to read together this holiday season. (not available in Survive the Storm)

objectives.description: Find 10 holiday story books

winterquest_2017_reactive_gather_fruitnu.name: Fruitcakes!
winterquest_2017_reactive_gather_fruitnu.description: Let's make a fruit cake! because why not? The ingredients are most commonly found in forests. (not available in Survive the Storm)

objectives.description: Harvest large bushes and collect 15 fruits and nuts

winterquest_2017_reactive_gather_traffic.name: Deck the Lights
winterquest_2017_reactive_gather_traffic.description: Can't spread good cheer without festive firepower! let's gather everything we need! Start by collecting switchboards from traffic and street lights. (not available in Survive the Storm)
winterquest_2017_reactive_gather_traffic.completionText: Winter schematic design is under way!

objectives.description: Harvest traffic and street lights to collect 10 switchboards

s12_reactivekill_quest_b3.name: Hero Training
s12_reactivekill_quest_b3.description: Show Knox what it takes to be a hero. Eliminate Mist Monsters or 'Sploders to show him how its done!

objectives.description: Eliminate Mist Monsters and 'Sploders!

s12_collect_quest_b4.name: Why We Fight
s12_collect_quest_b4.description: Knox and Lars found survivors near the storm. Get out there and rescue them!

objectives.description: Rescue survivors found by Knox.

s12_killcollect_quest_b6.name: The Test
s12_killcollect_quest_b6.description: THERAPYBOT has been asked to evaluate Knox, but the answer keys were stolen by husks. Eliminate Pitcher and Zapper husks and recover the answer booklets!

objectives.description: Eliminate Pitcher and Zapper husks to collect answer booklets

s12_fetch_quest_b5.name: It's Like A Dare
s12_fetch_quest_b5.description: Helping people, not hurting people. Now that the survivors are safe, help Knox gather supplies for them. Basic supplies. Very basic. HINT: Find stacks of toilet paper in bathrooms.

objectives.description: Search abandoned shelters and homes for toilet paper.

s12_gathercollect_quest_b2.name: Right In The Zeus
s12_gathercollect_quest_b2.description: Knox needs parts from vehicles to fix Lars' van. Help by breaking down abandoned vehicles to find what's needed. HINT: Parts best found in City and Suburb zones.

objectives.description: Gather vehicle parts by destroying vehicles.

s12_buildradar_quest_b7.name: Your Own Boss
s12_buildradar_quest_b7.description: Knox wants to try this "Constructor" thing. Help him by building a radar tower.

objectives.description: Build a radar tower for Knox.

s12_fetch_quest_b1.name: Henchin'
s12_fetch_quest_b1.description: Many personnel files were lost during the latest husk attack. Help the Director find hard copies of the files by searching old filing cabinets and uncover Knox's past.

objectives.description: Search filing cabinets for personnel files on Knox.

s12_fetch_quest_a2.name: Disco Demolition
s12_fetch_quest_a2.description: Ray has convinced Farrah to not destroy Homebase's capacity for love, instead they are going to destroy dance floors.

objectives.description: Place devices to destroy dance floors

s12_gathercollect_quest_a1.name: You're No Good
s12_gathercollect_quest_a1.description: Major Oswald has enlisted the help of Farrah to stop the spread of love. Her first suggestion is to deliver disheartening letters to the team of Homebase. Hint: Best found in Urban and Suburban zones.

objectives.description: Destroy mailboxes to collect envelopes

s12_fetch_quest_a4.name: Songs of Hate and Hate
s12_fetch_quest_a4.description: Lars is ready to debut his newest song inspired by the tragic break ups found in the discarded boxes. Deploy speakers in the area to blast the somber tune.

objectives.description: Deploy speakers to play Lars' new song

s12_fetch_quest_a5.name: Forbidden Love
s12_fetch_quest_a5.description: Major Oswald isn't giving up on his mission. Help spread anti-love propaganda by deploying flyer cannons.

objectives.description: Deploy flyer cannons to spread anti-love propaganda

s12_reactivekill_quest_a7.name: Leap of Faith
s12_reactivekill_quest_a7.description: Love is back! The love lobbers are also out in force. Eliminate as many as you can to prevent heartbreak.

objectives.description: Eliminate love lobbers

s12_danceemote_quest_a6.name: I'm Only Dancing
s12_danceemote_quest_a6.description: Ray wants to convince Homebase that love is worth the risk. The best way to accomplish this is to dance! Hint: Use a dance emote at the marked locations in the area.

objectives.description: Dance at marked dance locations

s12_fetch_quest_a3.name: Loveless
s12_fetch_quest_a3.description: Farrah has commissioned Lars to write a song which captures the anti-love spirit. Help by finding boxes of break-up materials to inspire the musician.

objectives.description: Find boxes of anti-love memorabilia
